tooltip: Never have I felt so invigorated, to have such a mighty Arkasodara fighting by my side!    - Ogul
description: Summon your wind-up Arkasodara minion. Comes with modesty covered.
name: Wind-up Arkasodara

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: The Hippo Riders turned to the Great Work to create these mammets as gifts for their patrons. Garbed in a traditional Thavnairian outfit, it boasts appeal as a local souvenir, and the redoubtable merchants of Yedlihmad are eyeing ways to profit from them.

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Resurrection -Among The Stars- Artbook

tooltip: *Ragnarok*, engage!    - Alphinaud
description: Summon your wind-up *Ragnarok* minion. Loporrit crew not included, delightful though that would be.
name: Wind-up Ragnarok

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: A scale model of the *Ragnarok*, the starship born of the blood, sweat, and tears of countless souls. From the bridge to the propulsion system, every part has been faithfully recreated in celebration of the original. And like the original, it ran its creators ragged from overwork.

tooltip: I must settle for crushing the ironmen's toys.    - Sadu
description: Summon your clockwork Novus D minion. Deftly driven by an unspecified (but doubtless incomparably brilliant) man.
name: Clockwork Novus D

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Modeled upon the popular magitek passenger vehicle Novus D, this tin toy is a favorite of Garlean children, who never tire of winding it up and watching it rattle along. A certain master engineer is said to have created it for both profit and pleasure.

tooltip: I was deep in my teacups at the time, but I know what I saw!    - Pungent Namazu
description: Summon your teacup Kapikulu minion. Small but eager to work.
name: Teacup Kapikulu

verminion.skill_description:
Renders action party immune to all attacks.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Though charged with the Kapikulu's maintenance in the depths of Alzadaal's Legacy, this mammet was largely idle. When trespassers finally appeared in the vault, it dared to hope that it could make itself useful again, but the Kapikulu's demise led to its unemployment.

tooltip: Bigger is not necessarily better.    - Man with a Familiar Voice
description: Summon your protonaught minion. The amount it can lift would put a full-grown Roegadyn to shame.
name: Protonaught

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: A miniaturized version of an Allagan construction machina, believed to have been created as a test prototype. Like the full-sized production models, it is remarkably strong relative to its proportions and can carry far more than its own weight.

tooltip: I heard some sky pirates go so far as to booby-trap their coffers.    - Lyolf
description: Summon your blue-footed booby minion. A terror from beak to tailfeather.
name: Blue-footed Booby

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

enhanced_description: Formerly of Mistbeard's dread band, this merciless seabird was known for disarming its victims with its vacant gaze before pecking them into submission. But that's all in the past, and it has long since retired to a quiet life hopping between the isles of the southern seas.

tooltip: From a hound at his throat to a puppy at his heel...    - Hien
description: Summon your Chewy minion. Take care not to drown in its literal puppy dog eyes.
name: Chewy

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: A small breed of dog native to the New World, this adorable critter was brought over to Eorzea by Lominsan sailors. Inquisitive and enthusiastic, it stands ever ready to embark on an adventure with you...but never says no to a spot of frolicking.

tooltip: I have faith that you'll bounce back.    - Hamon Holyfist
description: Summon your wind-up kangaroo minion. Always has a spring in its step.
name: Wind-up Kangaroo

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 70%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: This lifelike doll of a marsupial native to the southern continent of Meracydia was discovered by your retainer in an abandoned quarry village. The joey in its pouch seldom shows itself, but this is apparently all according to design.

tooltip: Let the fires rage!    - Azeyma
description: Summon your wind-up Azeyma minion. For those who like it scorching hot.
name: Wind-up Azeyma

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: While traveling through the desert in search of divine beauty, a goldsmith inadvertently wandered into the phantom realm. Though unsure if he was dreaming, he later recreated this automaton based on the woman he glimpsed within, imbuing it with her fiery grace.

tooltip: While I'm more of a “cat-lover,” variety is, after all, the spice of life!    - Gegeruju
description: Summon your hatching bunny minion. If happiness had form, it would look like this.
name: Hatching Bunny

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

enhanced_description: A mammet inspired by the peculiar rabbits in Jihli Aliapoh's vision. Initially missing a core, it sprung to life by the power of the crystal brought by an actual happy bunny, and will surely lead its owner to good fortune. Probably.

tooltip: The way she spoke, you'd think she was bloody royalty or something...    - Wiscar
description: Summon your royal lunatender minion. All that glitters is not gold. It could also be a lunatender.
name: Royal Lunatender

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: A mutation caused this lunatender to be golden in color─a trait which, while accentuating its royal lineage, rendered it easy prey on the moon's grey surface. Seeking a less harrowing life, it chose instead to become an Excitatron prize.

tooltip: Aren't bats just the cutest little plague-bearers you ever did see?    - Bat Enthusiast
description: Summon your nosferatu minion. Nothing if not gentlemanly...and perhaps bloodthirsty.
name: Nosferatu

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

enhanced_description: Though understood to refer to vampires, the word “nosferatu” has an uncertain origin, and the same may be said of this bat-like creature. However, from the fact that it appears to be wearing a dinner suit and won't drink your blood without permission, it is clearly a gentlemanly sort.

tooltip: This isn't a picnic we're going on, Palom.    - Porom
description: Summon forth your wind-up Porom minion. The rosy cheeks and pronounced eyelashes indicate that this is the female half of a matching pair.
name: Wind-up Porom

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Created in the likeness of Porom, twin sister to Palom. According to legend, they were sent by the elder of their village to aid in an epic quest to save the world, which seems like a bit of a tall order for two five-year olds. Perhaps the other mages had more important matters to take care of?

tooltip: This is a picnic compared to my officer training...    - Dancing Wolf
description: Summon your adventure basket minion. Because no one should have to save the world on an empty stomach.
name: Adventure Basket

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Be it a frozen waste or a volcano's fiery bowels, no matter where your adventures take you, this basket laden with tasty morsels will nourish your body while lifting your spirit. Cutlery and crockery included for your consuming convenience.

tooltip: Something lost in translation, perhaps?    - Jenomis
description: Summon your Golden Dhyata minion. Is it a bird? Is it a fish? No, it's a translation device!
name: Golden Dhyata

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: A faithful replica of the artifact being studied by Professor Rurusha, this translation device is believed to have been created in the likeness of a catfish. However, none can say why the ancients chose such a whimsical form for it.

tooltip: I prefer foes to be more compact like myself─tiny, puny, compact.    - 269th Order Mendicant Da Za
description: Summon your optimus Omicron minion. Minimum proportions, maximum performance.
name: Optimus Omicron

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **monster**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: As part of an initiative to downsize themselves, the Omicrons created this miniaturized, full-featured unit as a test prototype. Alas, the siege matrix Stigma-4 ceased to function shortly thereafter, and it never reached the mass production stage.

tooltip: Birds of a feather are we!    - X'rhun Tia
description: Summon your starbird minion. Gazing up at the stars in the heavens, it ever sings a song of hope.
name: Starbird

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

enhanced_description: A beautiful blue bird whose features are reminiscent of the star-faring creation Meteion. So long as hope abides in its master's heart, never shall its plumage take on the black of despair.

sources.text: Item code included with Endwalker Original Soundtrack

tooltip: The hour is come, Vrtra.    - Estinien
description: Summon your wind-up Vrtra minion. Last of his brood but certainly not least.
name: Wind-up Vrtra

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: A mammet designed in the likeness of the great wyrm Vrtra, who is said to be possessed of a gentle heart despite his fearsome appearance. Though this recreation is somewhat less fearsome than the actual wyrm, it is not for want of effort on its part.

tooltip: 'Tis time for action.    - Ancient Hero
description: Summon your wind-up herois minion. Come on, you know who this hero is.
name: Wind-up Herois

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: There once was a woman who selflessly served her fellow man as Azem. Even after stepping down, she continued in this mission, and went on to become a divinity that hope may endure. This mammet was made in her honor.

tooltip: What thinkest thou... of mine appearance?    - Urianger
description: Summon your brave new Urianger minion. Despite its diminutive size, its arms are no less weapons than those of the man himself.
name: Brave New Urianger

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

enhanced_description: While tidying up the solar at the Rising Stones, Tataru discovered a veritable army of wind-up Uriangers─the result of a misorder. Resourceful as ever, the Scions' coinkeeper altered their hair and attire, and marketed them as a limited edition model.

tooltip: So you think yourself an adept enough diver to brave the depths of the sea?    - Ajiro
description: Summon your wind-up Grebuloff minion. Smells vaguely like a rocky shore.
name: Wind-up Grebuloff

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: One day, a Namazu craftsman was swept away in the One River. As he tumbled along the riverbed, he had a vision of a mysterious being, which he recreated in the form of this mammet. Or so your retainer reports. Could such a life-form exist somewhere out there?

tooltip: My money is on writhing snakes.    - Thancred
description: Summon your Caduceus minion. Won't spit acid at you, so rest easy.
name: Caduceus

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 40%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: One of Hermes's pet creations, this intelligent serpent served as a message-bearer in Elpis. Perhaps due to his inherited memories, Amon would bestow the selfsame name upon another serpentine creation, which he dispatched to guard Dalamud.

tooltip: If yer playin' us false, I'll be back to feed the crabs with yer lyin' tongue.    - Rostnsthal
description: Summon your crabe de la crabe minion. If it were any crabbier, it would...probably still be a crab.
name: Crabe De La Crabe

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **monsters**.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: Native to Thavnair, this tree-dwelling crab became known to foreign scholars when an Arkasodara clan pointed them out to a visiting crew. So exemplarily crab-like were its features, it was promptly identified as such and given a name to match.

tooltip: Thou shalt not lift with thy back.    - Ancient Wisdom
description: Summon your hippo calf minion. Heavy. Assisted lift may be required.
name: Hippo Calf

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: Hippopotami are native to Meracydia, and scholars point to their presence in Thavnair as proof that trade thrived between the lands long ago. During the chaos of the Final Days, this calf became separated from its herd and strayed into your path in Vanaspati.

tooltip: I've never beheld such grace, such elegance, such... unfathomable beauty!    - Stricken Traveler
description: Summon your Nagxian cat minion. The very soul of grace and nobility, and can see souls to boot.
name: Nagxian Cat

verminion.skill_description: Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

enhanced_description: In former times in Nagxia, the breeding of this graceful and noble cat was permitted only to royalty and high priests. Yet it was not only for these traits that it was coveted; legend holds that its blue eyes can discern the aether of all things, including departed souls.

tooltip: I'm in no mood to be fawned over.    - Greinfarr
description: Summon your Flag minion. A little reindeer with a huge appetite.
name: Flag

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **critter**).

enhanced_description: So named for its fluttering tail, this adorable reindeer calf boasts a prodigious appetite that belies its size. Especially partial to corn, it threatened to devour clean a farmer's entire harvest, forcing the man to beg your retainer to take it away.

tooltip: Thanks to predation by other rodents, only the fittest and most vicious of squirrels survive to adulthood.    - Hunter-scholar
description: Summon your squirrel emperor minion. At once more powerful and adorable than a certain simian king.
name: Squirrel Emperor

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 180 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Fond of mortal children, the auspice Rissai once transformed himself into a learned man and taught the young ones their letters. Like the real auspice, this self-created avatar goes wherever the winds of philanthropy and delicious sweets blow.

tooltip: Distract me with your feminine wiles, and then strike when my guard is down?    - Carvallain
description: Summon your wind-up Anima minion. Warning: cannot be used to teleport or upgrade weapons.
name: Wind-up Anima

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: In old Garlean, the word “anima” means “soul,” though some philosophers have come to use it to refer to the hidden feminine side of men. Whether this explains why Anima's lower head appears feminine is debatable, but one thing is certain: no shins are safe from this mammet's fists of fury.

tooltip: All right, teamwork!    - Medrod
description: Summon your wind-up Magus Sisters minion. Essentially three minions for one, so it represents great value.
name: Wind-up Magus Sisters

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: The Magus Sisters are revered deities in Thavnair, and their images are popularly peddled in Radz-at-Han as talismans. Able to move about freely and perform impressive acrobatics, this set of the three divinities counts among the more premium offerings.

tooltip: Naught will escape my all-seeing eyes, no, no.    - Gyoka
description: Summon your wind-up Daivadipa minion. Can discern good and evil─so long as they are at knee height.
name: Wind-up Daivadipa

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 10.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: A mechanical image of Daivadipa, one of the Mrga traditionally worshipped in Thavnair. In the old tongue of the Arkasodara, his name means “heavenly light” or simply “eye”─a reference to his ability to discern good and evil.

tooltip: Waiting is boring, like watching moss grow on rocks.    - Vanu Scout
description: Summon your greener gleaner minion. Good at hiding, but clearly not good enough.
name: Greener Gleaner

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: Though genomos are adept at hiding among foliage, this young specimen couldn't escape your retainer's keen eyes. Due to their predilection for small insects, Sharlayans have long bred the creatures to keep pests under control.

tooltip: I swear he's part forest troll...    - Lightly Built Lab Assistant
description: Summon your tiny troll minion. The good kind that makes constructive, well-thought-out comments.
name: Tiny Troll

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **monsters** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Originally an inhabitant of Labyrinthos, this inquisitive young troll snuck into the Aitiascope, where it fell into the aetherial sea. There it met the souls of its ancestors─an experience that saw it mature beyond its tender years.

tooltip: This is sure to fetch a princely sum from Master Gegeruju!    - Zhloe Aliapoh
description: Summon your Prince Lunatender minion. Use as a decoration at risk of suffering puncture wounds─lots of them.
name: Prince Lunatender

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: As part of their efforts to make Smileton into a paradise, the Loporrits caught this prince among lunatenders to use as an ornamental plant. However, it was disinclined to suffer the indignity, and slipped into your bag and fled.

tooltip: My, how thoughtful!    - Cirina
description: Summon your wee Ea minion. Proof that you don't need to be big to think big.
name: Wee Ea

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: In order to rearrange their jumbled thoughts, the Ea are known to temporarily shed a small part of themselves. In this instance, however, said part took on a will of its own and embarked on a journey of contemplation.

tooltip: Why, it's a Starlight miracle!    - Amh Garanjy
description: Summon your Rudy minion. Eager to help, though perhaps not suited to guiding sleighs.
name: Wind-up Rudy

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Having served dutifully as one of the saint's little helpers, Rudy returned to his home deep in the mountains. But thanks to a Starlight miracle, a wandering saint succeeded in recreating a minion of the fellow so lifelike, it breathes.

tooltip: The will of Queen Gunnhildr shall not be denied.    - Misija
description: Summon your wind-up Gunnhildr minion. Protects her people as a queen, a god, and now a mammet.
name: Wind-up Gunnhildr

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, reduces the movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 20s
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Created in the likeness of Queen Gunnhildr, this mammet was found clutching a slip of paper bearing the words: “At journey's end, I discovered a new love...only to have it vanish with the ephemeral light.” In its mannerism, one cannot help but sense something familiar...

tooltip: Not a boy, an android.    - 2P
description: Summon your 9S automaton minion. For when you need the company of a compact version of an advanced combat android dressed in a distinctive subculture style.
name: 9S Automaton

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all enemies within range while increasing action party ATK by 20.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Recovered from the upper levels of the Tower, this diminutive automaton bears a resemblance to the android known as YoRHa No.9 Type S. What thoughts drove him and his kind, and to what end did they risk all in their fight? The answers to such questions may never be found...

tooltip: Nothing but lumps of rust if you ask me.    - Moogle
description: Summon your smaller stubby minion. A little rusted but still fit for purpose...whatever that may be.
name: Smaller Stubby

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Discovered on the upper levels of the Tower, this tiny lifeform resembles the short-legged machines that occupied the selfsame structure. Though it follows you relentlessly, scans the area menacingly, and punches vigorously, it appears to mean you no harm.

tooltip: Please, Cecil...Be alive!    - Rosa
description: Summon forth your wind-up Rosa minion. Based on the central corner of a one-sided love triangle, if such a thing is possible.
name: Wind-up Rosa

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

enhanced_description: Rosa is said to have been blessed with both powerful healing abilities and an unerring bow arm. Unfortunately, these were of little use on the occasion she came close to being either sliced by a guillotine or crushed by an iron ball, depending on which version of the tale one hears...

tooltip: That was an awfully fast recovery.    - Rydia
description: Summon forth your wind-up Rydia minion. Not to be confused with a sprig of broccoli.
name: Wind-up Rydia

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

enhanced_description: According to myth, Rydia went missing as a child only to reemerge a short while later as a woman grown. How she later came to be immortalized as a miniaturized mammet is unclear, though her voluminous bright green hair is said to be very true to life.

tooltip: You think our rage...a weakness? Then let me show you how wrong you are!    - Edge
description: Summon forth your wind-up Edge minion. Based on one of the few people who had the chance to be a prince *and* a ninja, which seems like too much fun to squeeze into one lifetime.
name: Wind-up Edge

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Legends tell of Edward Geraldine, the ninja prince who assumed the name Edge, presumably because it sounded more impressive. Rumors have it that “Edward” was already taken by another figure in the tale, and there cannot be two people sharing the same name─ it just gets confusing.

tooltip: Something stinks.    - Palom
description: Summon forth your wind-up Palom minion. Try not to break it.
name: Wind-up Palom

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 20.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Based on one half of a pair of twin mages, this charming minion brings an air of mischief wherever it goes. The tales say that the real Palom mastered the dark arts by the age of five, though one has to question whether teaching dangerous magic to small children is such a good idea.

tooltip: Few things compare to the simple pleasure of sitting beside a crackling campfire of one's own making.    - Alphinaud
description: Summon your wanderer's campfire minion. Perfect for driving away the darkness and the chill and, most importantly, toasting marshmallows.
name: Wanderer's Campfire

verminion.skill_description: Restores 200 HP to all allies within range (250 if the ally is a **gadget**).

enhanced_description: Couldn't strike a fire if your life depended on it? Sick of lugging around backbreaking loads of firewood on the off chance you need to camp out, but couldn't be bothered to gather the stuff at the end of a long, weary day? Introducing the wanderer's campfire!

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - The Devil's Crypt, Magos Trench

tooltip: Our legends will echo in eternity!    - Dorys
description: Summon your Benben stone minion. For when you need the top stone of a pyramid scampering around after you.
name: Benben Stone

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

enhanced_description: Long ago, the men of Meracydia built great stone monuments in the image of Benben, a mound of myth whose name means “eternity.” This object is the top piece of such a structure, but none can say how it came to be in the dark depths of a faraway sea─or why it has legs.

tooltip: Smash and burn their little toy, we will!    - Ixali Chieftain
description: Summon your magitek predator F1 minion. Comes complete with pilot and stands ready to wreak havoc among the enemy's ranks.
name: Magitek Predator F1

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Search Eye by 90%. No effect if Search Eye is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: This miniaturized model of an imperial warmachina was found among the forces of the Telophoroi laying siege to Paglth'an. By all appearances a toy of Garlean make, it is unclear how it managed to make its way to the southern reaches of Eorzea.

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Reflection -Histories Unwritten- Artbook

tooltip: Please, Runar, dry your tears. What would the others think if they saw you like this?    - Master Matoya
description: Summon your wind-up Runar minion. Because a single Runar pining for Master Matoya isn't enough.
name: Wind-up Runar

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: Designed in the likeness of Runar, this mammet was created to celebrate the signing of a trade agreement between the Night's Blessed and the Crystarium. In its pocket is a single white blossom, that the man can express his undying devotion to his beloved even if he is a world away.

sources.text: Item code included with Death Unto Dawn Original Soundtrack

tooltip: Lyna does not strike me as one who enjoys being made to wait.    - Alphinaud
description: Summon your wind-up Lyna minion. Don't forget to salute, or you're liable to receive a dressing-down.
name: Wind-up Lyna

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: In her cups at the tavern one night, Lyna agreed to let a dwarven craftsman create mammets in her likeness. Though she claims no memory of the incident, it can't be denied that the result is a masterful recreation of the good captain, down to the rousing salute.

tooltip: Sabotenders do not shake!    - Nanaphon
description: Summon your Senorita Sabotender minion. Like a thousand adorable needles piercing your eyeballs.
name: Senorita Sabotender

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: One of the coveted prizes on offer at the Gold Saucer, the Senorita Sabotender is the charming niece of the iconic Senor Sabotender. Each example is said to be lovingly handcrafted by the realm-renowned goldsmith and park proprietor, Godbert Manderville.

tooltip: I swear, if another one takes a shite on my hair, it'll be seagull stew for dinner tonight!    - V'kebbe
description: Summon your gull minion. Has a keen eye for finding schools of fish─and unguarded meals.
name: Gull

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: In a quest to find more food with less effort, this La Noscean gull took to following the fishing vessel *Endeavor*. Its resourcefulness earned it the respect of the ship's captain and crew, and it was made an honorary member of the Fishermen's Guild.

tooltip: So long, and thanks for all the fish.    - Dolphinkind
description: Summon your dolphin calf minion. Has more intelligence in a single winsome flipper than you do in your whole body.
name: Dolphin Calf

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: A Sharlayan biologist once stated that dolphins are the second-most intelligent species on the star. It was later noted that, regarding the most intelligent, the man made no comment. Sensing impending doom, this calf has attached itself to you in hopes of finding a way to flee to safety.

tooltip: I'll never find a wife at this rate.    - Gales
description: Summon your anteater minion. Definitely not a man-eater, otherwise that's what it would be called...right?
name: Anteater

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Thanks to its voracious appetite, this young anteater has grown to a size to rival an adult Lalafell. Though appearing to otherwise be harmless, in certain parts its kind is said to prey on seasonal workers─and the men specifically─thus earning it the moniker of the Widowmaker.

tooltip: How is our little princess doing?    - Serendipity
description: Summon your Save the Princess minion. For every person who has ever dreamed of owning a wheeled, spindly legged, trumpet-blowing mammet, there is this wheeled, spindly legged, trumpet-blowing mammet.
name: Save The Princess

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: Discovered deep in Delubrum Reginae, this bizarre contraption is believed to have been modeled after a much larger but equally bizarre contraption that once protected the ancient Bozjans from the Allagan Empire. The mystery of the trumpet, however, has yet to be solved.

tooltip: That is one big pile of shite.    - Aurvael's Assistant
description: Summon your Trike minion. Very affectionate, but be prepared to make a quick sidestep if it comes running to greet you.
name: Trike

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Rescued from the Diadem by Aurvael de Haillenarte after falling sick from eating poisonous berries. The count's son would rather this tale not be discussed openly, particularly the part about him delving into a pile of fresh dung to ascertain the cause of the disease.

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Sea of Jade 4, Wyrm's Rest

tooltip: I'll stick to swimming, thank you very much.    - Alisaie Leveilleur
description: Summon your Syldrion-class insubmersible minion. Unlike the craft on which it is modeled, it will break immediately upon coming into contact with water.
name: Syldrion-class Insubmersible

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Despite being an incredibly realistic replica of a Syldra-class submersible, it lacks any such aquatic capabilities. It is, however, able to hover in midair for a seemingly limitless amount of time, which is considerably more impressive.

tooltip: Let me get this straight. You came to talk to me about *biscuits*?    - Gaia
description: Summon your wind-up Gaia minion. Those who think the hammer is just for show had best watch their toes.
name: Wind-up Gaia

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 60%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: Supposedly discovered by those investigating the Empty, its appearance there is both inexplicable and implausible. Considering all the other unlikely events that occurred there, however, perhaps the sudden materialization of a hammer-wielding mammet is not so unusual after all.

sources.text: The Shifting Oubliettes of Lyhe Ghiah

tooltip: No, anything but beavers!    - Tyr Beq
description: Summon your golden beaver minion. Remember: all that glitters is not gold. Sometimes, it is a beaver.
name: Golden Beaver

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: Whether this creature is a beaver turned into gold, or gold turned into a beaver is anyone's guess. It is said to appear in the passages of Lyhe Ghiah at the very moment one's heart's desire is fulfilled. Given the location, that would generally involve some sort of treasure.

tooltip: Fishing's like philanderin'─ ye never know what ye'll catch!    - Wawalago Momolago
description: Summon forth your much-coveted Mora minion. Few wavekin have ever been the object of so much anticipation, only to be followed by such crushing disappointment.
name: Much-coveted Mora

verminion.skill_description: Transports action party to the central summoning Gate.

enhanced_description: The bane of many an ocean fisher, the Momora Mora exhibits all the qualities of much rarer and more desirable catches...until it is hoisted out of the water.

tooltip: Oh, how I envy the amaro. In all of creation, no animal is so pure, so perfect...    - Bethric
description: Summon your amaro hatchling minion. It may make a fine steed if you live long enough to see it reach maturity.
name: Amaro Hatchling

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: This infantile amaro's wings are not yet strong enough to lift it more than an ilm or so off the ground, try as it might. Given enough time around people, it may gain the gift of speech, but with you for a master, that process may be somewhat delayed...

tooltip: Is this water!? Blah! Bluh! Bleh!    - A Bewildered Amalj'aa
description: Summon your Drippy minion. With a will to wander the world, one wonders whether said world will welcome this well-meaning watery whelp.
name: Drippy

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

enhanced_description: This young nixie began life as rainwater that fell in Abalathia's Spine, and later found its way to Matoya's Relict via the Thaliak River. Having witnessed its elder kin summarily dispatched by the Warrior of Light, it decided to follow the age- old adage of “If one cannot beat them, one must needs join them.”

tooltip: They're fierce carnivores, who see steel-clad knights as nothing more than a packed lunch.    - Alexondre
description: Summon your Dáinsleif F1 minion. Does not form the head. Or any other part of the body, for that matter.
name: Dáinsleif F1

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Search Eye by 90%. No effect if Search Eye is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: Following the success of the magitek avenger, imperial scientists looked to various other creatures for inspiration in designing their next warmachina, this feline automaton being the test model for their studies into quadrupedal carnivores.

tooltip: Did that man just bring down flying armor with a single stroke *in midair*?    - Aymeric
description: Summon your magitek helldiver F1 minion. Minimal firepower, maximum attitude.
name: Magitek Helldiver F1

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

enhanced_description: Although a single-rider flying machina like the sky armor, the helldiver is an entirely different beast to handle due to its fundamentally distinct design. Thus were such scale models produced, that would-be pilots might study their flight dynamics prior to taking the helm.

tooltip: When is a dinosaur not a dinosaur?    - Folk Riddle
description: Summon your petit pteranodon minion. It might be cute now, but wait till it grows and becomes a scourge of the skies.
name: Petit Pteranodon

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%. 
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Abandoned by its parents, this pteranodon young was discovered by an Ishgardian botanist during a foray on the Diadem. Though initially aloof, through regular hand-feeding it grew fond of people, and was placed in your care that it might become a worldly sort of prehistoric creature.

tooltip: There is no creature so heavenly as the cat!    - Feline Fanatic
description: Summon your weatherproof gaelicat minion. Makes you feel toasty warm simply to behold it.
name: Weatherproof Gaelicat

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 13%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: It is theorized that the gaelicat's garb is no garb at all, but an extension of its corporeal form. That this specimen appears to be wearing a winter coat is the result of its adaptation to Coerthan climes, while its ample girth came about via a more mundane process: overeating.

tooltip: Not that I'm not eager to take apart an android, but...how do we...do that?    - Konogg
description: Summon your 2P automaton minion. For when you need the company of a compact version of an advanced combat android dressed in a distinctive subculture style.
name: 2P Automaton

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

enhanced_description: Though this automaton found within the Puppets' Bunker bears a resemblance to the android known as YoRHa No.2 Type P, it thankfully doesn't appear to be hostile. Created through unknown technology, how it operates is a complete mystery.

tooltip: So there're androids, which are machines, but also other machines, and also...    - Dig Site Chief
description: Summon your 2B automaton minion. For when you need the company of a compact version of an advanced combat android dressed in a distinctive subculture style.
name: 2B Automaton

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Recovered from deep within the Puppets' Bunker, this diminutive automaton bears a resemblance to the android known as YoRHa No.2 Type B. Why such a thing was created and by whom, however, are questions that will likely remain unanswered.

tooltip: The time has come.
description: Summon your Damona minion. The daughter of an Oni pirate king.
name: Damona

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: The daughter of an Oni pirate king. She is learned in the mystic arts but, as a trade-off, lacks emotion.

tooltip: My lord!
description: Summon your Zazel minion. Counselor to generations of Enmas, the Yo-kai kings.
name: Zazel

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: Counselor to generations of Enmas, the Yo-kai kings. He repelled the corruption of the Overseer with the last Enma after he abdicated the throne.

tooltip: Let us be off!
description: Summon your Lord Ananta minion. The new ruler of the Yo-kai World.
name: Lord Ananta

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: The new ruler of the Yo-kai World. Once a rival of the now abdicated King Enma, he became a trusted ally and friend.

tooltip: Bring it on!
description: Summon your Lord Enma minion. The last in a line of kings who guided the fate of the Yo-kai World.
name: Lord Enma

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: The last in a line of kings who guided the fate of the Yo-kai World. Within him dwell both the souls of a courageous young human boy and an all-powerful Yo-kai.

tooltip: A “lali-ho” gets a “lali-ho,” you hear?    - Giott
description: Summon your Lalinator 5.H0 minion. It doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And it absolutely will not stop, ever, until you have been lali-ho'd.
name: Lalinator 5.H0

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: Wishing to improve his lackluster lali-hoing, Ronitt created this automaton in secret to be his practice partner. Boasting precision movement and powered by dwarven ethanol, it performs rousing lali-hos the equal of any dwarf worth his ale.

tooltip: And you say his muscles swelled to bursting, like firm melons ripening in the summer sun!?    - Company Muscle
description: Summon your Allagan melon minion. Capable of movement and tremendously juicy.
name: Allagan Melon

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 270 to all enemies within range.
 **Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Since ancient times, melons have been favored in many cultures as nature's drinking flask. Not satisfied with merely their thirst-quenching property, however, Allagan scientists set out to make them portable, and this self-propelled melon is the fruit of their labors.

tooltip: As brightly as a hero's tale shines, it is not without its shadows.    - The Wandering Minstrel
description: Summon your wind-up Ardbert minion. What he lacks in size, he makes up for in heart...and his disproportionately large axe.
name: Wind-up Ardbert

verminion.skill_description:
Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eye impervious to damage.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: This mammet was created to honor Ardbert, the hero who fought to save the First as a Warrior of Light and Darkness both. His spirit lives on in all who has ever thought to lend a helping hand to his fellow man.

tooltip: By any other name, I would still be a rose!    - Masked Rose
description: Summon your wind-up Mystel minion. Modeled upon no one in particular. No, really.
name: Wind-up Mystel

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Desiring to honor a certain individual with a mammet likeness but knowing that it would go against his wishes to do so, the artisans of the Crystalline Mean came up with the perfect solution: make a mammet likeness anyway but give it a vague name. That makes everything all right...right?

tooltip: You can't smoke out a fox with hot air.    - Bran
description: Summon your sand fox minion. Will perform tricks for a lick of birch syrup.
name: Sand Fox

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

enhanced_description: The descendent of a thousand-year-old vulpine spirit, this creature dreamed of training under the tutelage of its legendary forebear, Sotan. Alas, it was turned away, and ended up taking you as its master instead. Though it will devour most anything you give it, it has grown fond of birch syrup.

tooltip: If you go and die on me, I'll pay a  necromancer to raise you from the dead so I can kill you out of spite!    - Renda-Rae
description: Summon your ephemeral necromancer minion. If it could, it would summon forth an army of equally adorable undead.
name: Ephemeral Necromancer

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

enhanced_description: As a token of gratitude for playing with them, a pixie created for you this miniature version of the spectral necromancer, the hero from a distant world whom you fought. Whoever that mysterious maiden may have been, her tale may never be known.

tooltip: Never fuss over a sarcosuchus.    - Traditional Children's Song
description: Summon your Laladile minion. Because small is beautiful.
name: Laladile

verminion.skill_description:
Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eye impervious to damage.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: Unlike its monstrous cousins, this scalekin grows no more than a few fulms long and is docile besides. Once favored as a pet by Ishgardian nobility, who named it for the affable Lalafellin folk, it is known to befriend other creatures such as small birds.

tooltip: We'll see if our bite's worse than our bark.    - Hilda
description: Summon your Cerberpup minion. With three wet little noses and three sets of adorable staring eyes, what's not to love? Aside from all of the teeth, obviously.
name: Cerberpup

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

enhanced_description: This peculiar creature was found in a dark corner of a storehouse belonging to House Haillenarte. As voidsent are not uncommon in the wilds of Coerthas, it was at first thought to be a lesser such monstrosity, but─aside from the three heads─it appears to be an ordinary pup.

tooltip: There are too many of them. Too many dinosaurs for us to face alone!    - Vath Braveheart
description: Summon your Malone minion. If it weren't following you around, it would be tearing hapless adventurers apart on the Diadem.
name: Malone

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: A young prehistoric creature found on the Diadem, whose unforgiving environment forged its kind into ruthless predators. For reasons unknown, it saw you as friend instead of food, and began following you. Ever ravenous, it snaps at its own tail whenever it comes into view.

tooltip: Death by ungainly paissa... thought mortifies Vanu worse than forgetting sundrop dance!    - Eenu Vanu
description: Summon your paissa threadpuller minion. Currently in training as a weaver, and looks the part.
name: Paissa Threadpuller

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: When mysterious embroidery began appearing on the garments of her Rose Knights, Lady Laniaitte set out to uncover the perpetrator. Her surveillance led to the capture of this paissa young, which was made to work in Ishgard's restoration as punishment, though it appears happy enough.

tooltip: They don't come much curiouser than the paissa.    - Noelle
description: Summon your paissa patissier minion. Currently in training as a culinarian, and looks the part.
name: Paissa Patissier

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: This paissa young was found amongst supplies sent from Camp Cloudtop. As punishment for pillaging the victuals, it was put to work in the kitchens, where it surprised everyone by demonstrating an aptitude for the culinary arts. The caramel milk tea it makes is to die for.

tooltip: The damn things reproduce faster than rabbits in heat.    - Raganher
description: Summon your unlucky rabbit minion. Has known the bitterest lows and the sweetest highs.
name: Unlucky Rabbit

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%. 
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Born of an idea proposed by Godbert Manderville, this leporine mammet proved tremendously popular in Ul'dah, but questions of ownership rights led to it serving as the mascot of the Platinum Mirage for a spell. It eventually returned to the Gold Saucer after legal matters were settled.

tooltip: The challenge of deciphering the wisdom of the ancients is a researcher's dream.    - Y'mhitra
description: Summon your ancient one minion. Small and appearing to be fractured, but whole.
name: Ancient One

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **critters**.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: This lifelike miniature of an ancient was recreated from a small concept crystal discovered in Anamnesis Anyder. Though believed to have been some manner of toy, given the towering stature of the ancients, its size is comparable to that of a Lalafellin child.

tooltip: We're going to get along like a leafman on fire, I just know it!    - Uin Nee
description: Summon your little leafman minion. Definitely a leafman. The pixie said so.
name: Little Leafman

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
 **Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: This curious being was found amongst the wares peddled by a pixie playing merchant. While it does bear resemblance to the leafmen scattered across Il Mheg, that it is able to move raises eyebrows, but inquiring after the reason only elicits impish laughter from the pixie.

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Reflection -Histories Forsaken- Artbook

tooltip: Dear─ Dearest─ I─ I can't─    - Chai-Nuzz
description: Summon your wind-up Dulia-Chai minion. Complete with asphyxiated Chai-Nuzz.
name: Wind-up Dulia-Chai

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: On the occasion of their twenty-fifth anniversary, Chai-Nuzz gifted his wife her mammet likeness, which he made using Talos construction techniques. It was subsequently presented to the departing Warrior of Darkness as a memento─ with one small addition.

tooltip: What about... Ryne?    - Thancred
description: Summon your wind-up Ryne minion. Not merely a palette swap.
name: Wind-up Ryne

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: With hair of spun gold and eyes of clearest sapphire, this young maiden was an incarnation of Minfilia, by whose name she was known. In the course of her journey, however, she chose to take her destiny into her own hands, and with it came a new look, name, and automaton likeness.

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - The Open Robe, Rogo-Tumu-Here's Haunt, The Devil's Crypt, Sirensong 2

tooltip: Oh, isn't it adorable?    - Jihli Aliapoh
description: Summon your silver dasher minion. Never was there a bird so adorable.
name: Silver Dasher

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: This little bird suddenly appeared inside the hold of a submersible, in all likelihood wandering in when the mammet pilot surfaced the vessel and opened the hatch for fresh air. It has since gone on to charm everyone with its adorable appearance and antics.

sources.text: No More Fish In The Sea I

tooltip: To think I almost 'ad ye fed to the sharks!    - Rhoswen
description: Summon your Major-General minion. It's a shark. With legs.
name: The Major-General

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: “Many heads are so passé. Legs are the wave of the future,” someone did say. Little did they know that there already were sharks that possessed not only legs, but arms besides. How these killing machines came to be, however, is a question left unpondered if you value your sanity.

sources.text: Yuqurl Manl - The Rak'tika Greatwood - 8 Qitari Compliments

tooltip: Screee-eee!    - The Behatted Serpent of Ronka
description: Summon your Behatted Serpent of Ronka minion. Tremble, child of man, for a creature of purest divinity wiggleth before thee in all of its behatted glory.
name: The Behatted Serpent Of Ronka

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Seeking to honor the Great Serpent of Ronka, the Stewards recreated the stylish ensemble it was once observed sporting, and made an offering of it to one of the divinity's incarnations gracing the Stopple. All agree that the outfit brings out the stately serpent's adventurous aspect.

sources.text: Yuqurl Manl - The Rak'tika Greatwood - 8 Qitari Compliments

tooltip: Scree! Scree!    - The Behelmeted Serpent of Ronka
description: Summon your Behelmeted Serpent of Ronka minion. Tremble, child of man, for a creature of purest divinity wiggleth before thee in all of its behelmeted glory.
name: The Behelmeted Serpent Of Ronka

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 10% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

enhanced_description: This incarnation of the Great Serpent of Ronka is said to have appeared before the Stewards and directed them to restore the broken Qitari stela. Though equipped with a mining helm, the all-seeing divinity obviously has no need of such mortal contrivances to navigate dark caverns.

tooltip: A much smaller Talos from our company could just as easily perform the same task!    - Chai-Nuzz
description: Summon your sungold Talos minion. Guaranteed to make you the envy of collectors and younglings alike.
name: Sungold Talos

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 90%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: During its heyday, Daedalus Stoneworks created this miniature Talos, which boasts true-to-life detail and a premium gold overlay. It proved so popular, the story goes that, to meet demand, the company had to recruit master gilders from all over Norvrandt.

sources.text: Maudlin Latool Ja - Ul'dah - 400 Allied Seals (60 BLU)

tooltip: Verdict: Guilty. Punishment: Eradication!    - Brute Justice
description: Summon your Cute Justice minion. Rocket Punch parts may present a choking hazard. Not for children under the age of two.
name: Cute Justice

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

enhanced_description: Lovingly crafted by an ex-Illuminati scientist now in the employ of the Garlond Ironworks, this colorful toy version of Brute Justice is composed of multiple pieces cast in solid zinc so that it may stand against even the most rambunctious of children.

tooltip: I find myself less and less inclined to sear your squid!    - Orn Khai
description: Summon your dress-up Estinien minion. Sun-dried squid not included.
name: Dress-up Estinien

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all enemies within range while increasing action party ATK by 20.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: A mammet fashioned in the likeness of the Azure Dragoon Estinien following his retirement from service. Created for the purpose of educating the younger generation about the Dragonsong War, it has been distributed to places of learning throughout Ishgard.

tooltip: Only a knight errant may break a stalemate.    - Drillemont
description: Summon your miniature white knight minion. Aids in the purging of sickness. Or not.
name: Miniature White Knight

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Crafted by the Skysteel Manufactory, this mammet was originally conceived for the Temple Knights to use in their strategizing, its mobility allowing for greater realism in battle simulations. Programmed to seek out formidable opponents.

tooltip: Machina are mighty and can smite muchly, yes, but they need fuel.    - Softknox
description: Summon your pod 316 minion. The perfect assistant for adventuring...or it would be, if it worked properly.
name: Pod 316

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Dug up in the depths of a factory fallen to ruin, this diminutive black machina was apparently designed to provide tactical support to a YoRHa. While most of its functions are no longer operational, it remains determined to attend the object of its support.

tooltip: Machines are not to be trusted, least of all those that can think.    - Estinien
description: Summon your pod 054 minion. The perfect assistant for adventuring...or it would be, if it worked properly.
name: Pod 054

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: Dug up in the depths of a factory fallen to ruin, this diminutive white machina was apparently designed to provide tactical support to a YoRHa. Though equipped with myriad functions, from support fire to advance conversation, none of these are operational at present.

sources.text: Jul Oul - Il Mheg - 8 Fae Fancy

tooltip: Come and play with us...    - Titania
description: Summon your wind-up pixie minion. Won't make mischief at your expense─pixie's honor.
name: Wind-up Pixie

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

enhanced_description: The Dreamspinners present this mammet as a gift to those children whom they have befriended. Unlike a real pixie, it doesn't make mischief, so you don't need to constantly be looking over your shoulders.

tooltip: Your mother was a hobgoblin!    - Giott
description: Summon your wind-up hobgoblin minion. Crafted in the likeness of your mother...or so certain dwarves would say.
name: Wind-up Hobgoblin

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 270 to all enemies within range.
 **Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Contrary to what certain dwarves may claim, the hobgoblin upon which this mammet was based is no relation of yours; rather, it was a creature that was haunting your retainer's dreams. By crafting this minion and gifting it to another, they hoped to pass on the nightmare.

tooltip: Quite a catch indeed!    - Nortmoen
description: Summon your domakin minion. Close, but not a warrior with the body of a mortal and soul of a dragon.
name: Domakin

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Reeled in by your retainer, this delightfully plump fish was created by a Doman goldfish enthusiast, its name a portmanteau of his nation and the local word for gold. It floats in the air by virtue of the cloudsbreath seeds it devoured, though how it manages to breathe is unknown.

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Coldtoe Isle, The Open Robe, The Stone Barbs, Bladefall Chasm, Sirensong 1

tooltip: I am rather looking forward  to basking in the sunshine of her praise.    - Emmanellain
description: Summon your meerkat minion. Keeps an eye out for danger while basking in the sun.
name: Meerkat

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: Native to lands bordering the Sea of Ash, these small beastkin dwell in underground colonies, emerging from their burrows as the sun rises in order to bask in the warmth. Curiosity brought this creature to a submersible undergoing repairs on the shore, and it hasn't looked back since.

tooltip: Seeds know no borders; they will sprout wheresoever the earth embraces them.    - Martineau
description: Summon your little leannan minion. Doesn't see you as food. Yet.
name: Little Leannan

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 60%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: Having just recently sprouted, this leannan young still possesses a mild temperament, but as its demands for nutrients grow, it will begin to hunt men and beasts alike. In preparation for this, it has already begun practicing its skills of enthrallment.

tooltip: I ain't got the patience for no mystic rubbish today.    - Gerolt
description: Summon your mystic weapon minion. Only slightly cursed.
name: Mystic Weapon

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: While out on a venture, your retainer discovered a timeworn blade and took it in their hand...whereupon a peculiar creature manifested. Though the weapon was believed to be cursed, the retainer was reportedly not concerned, as it was to be given to you in any case.

tooltip: I am curious as to what mischief the flying pig has in mind...    - Sue-Rend
description: Summon your bacon bits minion. Tastes like bacon...if bacon and clay taste the same to you.
name: Bacon Bits

verminion.skill_description: Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

enhanced_description: After seeing a dream wherein they were being followed by a flying pig, a retainer out gathering absent-mindedly worked some clay into the creature's likeness. To their surprise, the creature suddenly sprang to life─ most likely at the hands of a pixie bent on mischief.

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - The Southern Charnel Trench, The Central Charnel Trench, The Slipped Anchor

tooltip: Not water! Anything but water!    - Zahar'ak Hatchling
description: Summon your sharksucker-class insubmersible minion. Warning: do not immerse.
name: Sharksucker-class Insubmersible

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all enemies within range while increasing action party ATK by 20.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Built by a mammet voyager in a moment of boredom, this clockwork ship raises several questions about machine ethics by its very existence. Another, perhaps more significant question it raises is, “Why build a functioning model submersible and not make it watertight?”

tooltip: Did you really think I would go gently into that dark night with so much left undone?    - Y'shtola
description: Summon your brave new Y'shtola minion. Not wont to run from her troubles─and couldn't get very far, anyway.
name: Brave New Y'shtola

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Lovingly crafted by the Night's Blessed, this tiny mechanical Y'shtola─“Master Matoya,” to some─wears the black garb that marks her a member of their community, and bears a deadwood rod symbolizing her commitment to driving back the Light.

tooltip: The first rule of dealing with the Fuath...is do *not* deal with the Fuath.    - Ardbert
description: Summon your wind-up Fuath minion. Markedly less murderous than the real thing.
name: Wind-up Fuath

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, reduces the movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 20s
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Though this clockwork automaton─magically rendered waterproof for amphibious adventuring─possess no heart in which to harbor malice, the fact that it was created at the hands of *real* Fuath is cause enough to wonder what tricks it may be hiding up its tiny sleeve.

tooltip: For what was once shattered may be forged anew.    - Ryne
description: Summon your Eden Minor minion. Free of sin, though not for lack of trying.
name: Eden Minor

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 380 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: In a demonstration of its godlike power that may be generously termed “unfathomable,” Eden created this tiny being in its image. Fortunately, the amount of aether Eden Minor can manipulate is so minuscule that, despite its best efforts, it poses little danger to the world at large.

sources.text: Fathard - Eulmore - 6 Archaeotania's Horn (FATE "The Head, The Tail, the Whole Damned Thing")

tooltip: How do you measure half a bell anyway?    - Mauto
description: Summon your tinker's bell minion. Said to be named for a pixie...unless you ask the pixies, who adamantly deny that any of their kind would ever have borne such a ludicrous name.
name: Tinker's Bell

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
 **Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Discovered fallen off the monstrous Archaeotania by an Ondo youth, this enigmatic instrument, half-bell and half-maiden, is believed to be either an adornment from ancient times or a recreation thereof. Upon it is inscribed an enchantment that amplifies magical power.

sources.text: Fathard - Eulmore - 6 Formidable Cog (FATE "A Finale Most Formidable")

tooltip: A-digging we will go!    - Korutt
description: Summon your ironfrog ambler minion, a darling, diminutive, dwarven-made...automaton.
name: Ironfrog Ambler

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

enhanced_description: This diminutive automaton is designed to automatically load itself with the ore which serves as its energy source. However, the function appears to be overactive, resulting in it compulsively checking whether the ore is present. The wind-up key is a purely aesthetic addition.

tooltip: A man could study for two lifetimes and only learn half of what you know.    - Cid
description: Summon your wind-up G'raha Tia minion. The future is where his destiny awaits.
name: Wind-up G'raha Tia

verminion.skill_description:
Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eye impervious to damage.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: In order to fund the expedition to the Syrcus Trench, Tataru crafted this series of automaton, modeled upon a certain Archon, the tales of whom she heard from Rammbroes.

tooltip: Fran is not too bad, once you're on her good side.    - Rinok
description: Summon your wind-up Fran minion. Stilettos guaranteed not to impede progress through markedly rough terrain such as jungles, bogs, and abandoned monasteries serving as prisons for extra-dimensional forces of evil.
name: Wind-up Fran

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: Taking a page from the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, Bangaa fusilier Rinok secretly commissioned the creation of scores of miniature Fran fetishes in an effort to fill the coffers of the perpetually under-funded resistance movement spearheaded by Lente's Tears.

sources.text: Item code included with Shadowbringers Original Soundtrack

tooltip: If anyone can make Suzaku see reason, it's you. Good luck!    - Senri
description: Summon your wind-up Suzaku minion, complete with her flute and her senses.
name: Wind-up Suzaku

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Upon hearing the tale of his compatriot Soroban's adventures, a Kojin dollmaker was moved to honor the Four Lords, guardians of the Ruby Sea. This recreation of Suzaku is one of the fruits of his efforts, masterfully capturing the essence of the legendary auspice.

tooltip: A ring, a ring, a wondrous thing, when its metal band hides a Nu Mou's sting!♪     - Nee Marn
description: Summon your wind-up Nu Mou minion. So cuddlesome it hurts.
name: Wind-up Nu Mou

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: Designed in the likeness of a former member of Clan Nutsy, this automaton appears so cuddlesome as if it were made of cotton. Most folk think twice about cuddling it, however, when they learn it was actually made by a Nu Mou claybender using mud and mushroom spores.

sources.text: Giant Beaver - Il Mheg - 1 Dancing Wing (Titania)

tooltip: Something tells me that's one more mystery better left unsolved.    - Ellie
description: Summon your giant beaver minion, a mystery better left unsolved.
name: Giant Beaver

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

enhanced_description: A mysterious being that appeared at Phisor Lran. Whatever may be the truth of its identity, some mysteries in the world are better left unsolved. Let it be enough that everyone has their heart's desire...

tooltip: Love can move shoebills.    - Ancient Ballad
description: Summon your shoebill minion, an unflappable bird possessed of a regal air...or perhaps simply a condescending one.
name: Shoebill

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 40%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Common to Kholusia, the shoebill is known for being literally unmoving. Its hunting effort consists of waiting for prey to wander by its feet before it deigns to strike. For reasons unknown, it saw fit to accept you as its master, and now follows you wherever you go...with the bare minimum of exertion.

tooltip: Aren't you just the most adorable little thing!?     - Jessie
description: Summon your bitty duckbill minion. Do not attempt to put on your feet.
name: Bitty Duckbill

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 20 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Named for its duck-like bill, this creature hunts not by sight or smell, but rather by sensing the aetheric discharge from prey. It can also deliver a potent venom from the spurs on its hindfeet, causing great pain if not death─ a sobering contrast to its adorable appearance.

tooltip: Take wing, ye souls of war!    - Ravana
description: Summon your butterfly effect minion. Illusory and therefore incapable of invoking any history-shattering consequences...right?
name: Butterfly Effect

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: There is a theory which states that the fluttering of a butterfly's wings may give rise to a raging storm a thousand malms away. This crystal has nothing to do with that theory; rather, it is said to simply be the work of a priest of Ronka, created during a bout of boredom.

tooltip: Screee!    - The Great Serpent of Ronka
description: Summon your Great Serpent of Ronka minion. Tremble, child of man, for a creature of purest divinity wiggleth before thee.
name: The Great Serpent Of Ronka

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%. 
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: This creature, Quinfort insists, is none other than the all-seeing, all-powerful Great Serpent of Ronka. Though its wobbly girth may deceive the eye, that is, presumably, a mere mark of the serpent's mercy, for its true form would be too terrible for mortal minds to comprehend.

tooltip: Oh, I suggest nothing so glamorous.    - Nero tol Scaeva
description: Summon your chameleon minion and marvel as it melts into your surrounds.
name: Chameleon

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 50%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: By channeling aether into its crystal-coated scales, the chameleon can alter its appearance to blend into the surrounding environment in a mechanism not unlike that of glamour prisms. For its penchant for adopting new looks, it has earned a reputation as the “glamourous scalekin.”

tooltip: They expected hounds on their trail and I sssent them a dragon!    - Eshana
description: Summon your black hayate minion. Gaze upon the visage of a ruthless killer.
name: Black Hayate

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 40.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Despite their endearing appearance, black hayate are oft employed as guard and sheep dogs, as they react to threats with shocking ferocity. It was for this reason that the breed was named after a piece of lethal weaponry from its eastern homeland, now lost to the Flood.

tooltip: Initiating system shutdown...
description: Summon your wind-up Omega-F minion to test the efficacy of combat role allocation.
name: Wind-up Omega-F

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (60 if the ally is wind-up Omega-M).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: This automaton is the work of a goldsmith who desired to explore new definitions of beauty. When an engineer of Garlond Ironworks went to question the man about how he came upon his subject matter, he is said to have abruptly vanished, as if swallowed into the Interdimensional Rift.

tooltip: <bleep> hELLo, WOrlD!?
description: Summon your wind-up Omega-M minion to observe your irrational behavior.
name: Wind-up Omega-M

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (40 if the ally is wind-up Omega-F).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: This automaton is the work of a goldsmith who desired to explore new definitions of beauty. Upon delivering a batch to the House of Splendors, the man is said to have declared, “To understand the one, one must understand the other. For their beauty lies in the whole.”

tooltip: I'm just going to assume that cube is an eater.    - Thancred
description: Summon your forgiven hate minion. Having repented its sins, it poses no danger.
name: Forgiven Hate

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: A sin eater-esque something or other found on Mt. Gulg. Though it follows you relentlessly, as if driven by hate, it can do little save flutter about and occasionally unravel itself. There seems to be no harm in keeping it with you for now...

tooltip: I shall enjoy sucking on its tail for that sweet, sweet nectar taste!    - Overzealous Nu Mou
description: Summon your tiny echevore minion. Its tail tastes like nectar...but you wouldn't know such things.
name: Tiny Echevore

verminion.skill_description:
Grants action party the ability to deal extra damage to Arcana Stones.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: The scales on this critter's back are arranged in such a way as to put one in mind of the succulent echeveria. Lying concealed in tall grass, it lures insects with its tail, which secretes a sweet-tasting fluid akin to nectar.

tooltip: What a delicious morsel! I wanna get my tentacles around her...    - Ultros
description: Summon your clionid larva minion, small on size but massive on appetite.
name: Clionid Larva

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Search Eye by 90%. No effect if Search Eye is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: A relative of the sea slug, the clionid feeds on plankton early in life. As it matures, however, it begins consuming flesh in order to satisfy its voracious appetite, and uses the tentacles extending from its head to latch onto prey. For now it follows you obediently. For now...

tooltip: In another three hundred years, I'll be bigger and stronger than you will ever be!    - Ohl Deeh
description: Summon your micro gigantender minion. Is it small or is it big? You be the judge.
name: Micro Gigantender

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 8% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

enhanced_description: Though known for their prodigious size, gigantenders come into the world small and grow ever so slowly. This creature is estimated to be between twenty and thirty years of age, which by gigantender standards is still considered young. The oldest known creatures are said to live beyond two centuries.

tooltip: Who was that armored devil!?     - Alphinaud
description: Summon your armadillo bowler minion. Possessed of a superior sense of balance.
name: Armadillo Bowler

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **monsters**.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Armadillos are seldom caught without their rocks, which they use to defend themselves from enemies. As a large rock bespeaks strength and status, one may occasionally see bravado-bound beasts that unwisely choose something beyond their ability to lift.

tooltip: We would be singing of mending socks and sitting on cushions.    - The Wandering Minstrel
description: Summon your zephyrous zabuton minion. More pushing for another cushion.
name: Zephyrous Zabuton

verminion.skill_description: Transports action party to the central summoning Gate.

enhanced_description: It is well documented that Hingans shun chairs, preferring instead to sit upon the floor. What is less known, however, is that when a speaker utters something deemed clever, she is rewarded with cushions that she may sit in a position elevated above her peers.

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of the Revolution -Eastern Memories-

tooltip: Tataru's expression grows ever darker each time I see her pass by.    - Slafborn
description: Summon your dress-up Tataru minion. Say what you will, she wears it well.
name: Dress-up Tataru

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: To thank those adventurers who have come to her aid while in Kugane, Tataru Taru of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn has been presenting her knights in shining armor with handcrafted replicas of...herself, fully clad in the finest silks from Bukyo.

tooltip: The Qalyana are another Ananta tribe─the strongest and the most influential.    - M'naago
description: Summon your wind-up Qalyana minion. She may or may not break through the borderline.
name: Wind-up Qalyana

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: The ex-Gatekeeper who crafted this doll claims her model was a Qalyana battlemaid who awoke from her reverie to join Alpa in the headstrong Vira's endeavor to protect the realm. She hopes it serves to strengthen the bond 'twixt the Ananta tribes.

tooltip: I'm a giant tortoise! A tortoise!    - Soroban
description: Summon your wind-up Redback minion. Don't tell mom the Kojin minion's red.
name: Wind-up Redback

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 10%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: A master craftsman hailing from the Kojin of the Blue conceived this miniature automaton with the hopes that it might one day bring together his clan and the Kojin of the Red. How exactly an automaton might do that has yet to be determined...

tooltip: It is the enemy that weighs on me─snow, rather than fire.    - Martiallais
description: Summon your yukinko snowflake minion. Falling, falling, falling, falling, falling...falling on his head.
name: Yukinko Snowflake

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 70 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: The yukinko's woven headdress serves not only to protect the creature from the elements, but spare it the embarrassment of having its nakedness exposed unto the world─not that any sane man would dare peek under the straw, lest he risk eternal damnation.

tooltip: Men measure virtue in many ways.    - Yayaroku
description: Summon your Conditional Virtue minion. Cuddle not to dullness; coddle not to elevation.
name: Conditional Virtue

verminion.skill_description:
Increases caster ATK by 10 and DEF by 5 for every 5% of HP lost.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: From a pulsating mass of aetherial flesh sloughed off the Eurekan elemental Absolute Virtue did rise this uncanny facsimile, identical to its progenitor in every way─every way, that is, except size and, well, absoluteness.
