tooltip: Put that damnable thing down, Ramza. You're not helping matters!    - Jenomis cen Lexentale
description: Summon your wind-up Ramza minion. Stands ready to fight for truth, justice, and the Ivalician way.
name: Wind-up Ramza

verminion.skill_description:
Renders action party immune to all attacks.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Designed after Ramza Beoulve─unsung champion of Ivalician legend and not the son of the exiled Majestic Theater Company principal─this mammet's creation was commissioned by Jenomis cen Lexentale to pay honor to the true hero of the Zodiac Brave Story.

tooltip: This guy are sick.    - Aerith
description: Summon your wind-up Aerith minion. The future ith not only yourth.
name: Wind-up Aerith

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **critters**.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: A somber reimagining of the ill-fated flowermonger who would set off on a journey to discover herself, only to find more than she bargained for. What is wind-up can never die.

tooltip: ...something.    - Cloud
description: Summon your wind-up Cloud minion. Sharp hair, don't care.
name: Wind-up Cloud

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 380 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: At first glance, it appears that the artisan took numerous liberties in this rendition of the legendary hero─the distinct lack of upper-body muscle mass suggesting Cloud would have been unable to even lift a weapon the size of the Buster Sword, let alone brandish it over his head.

tooltip: Thankless job, carrier is.    - Ehcatl Nine Carrier
description: Summon your minitek conveyor minion. The latest in miniature transport technology.
name: Minitek Conveyor

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 8s

enhanced_description: It is not in Garlean nature to leave well enough alone, and so imperial magitek engineers crafted miniature versions of their mountable conveyor unit. However, through some design flaw, the automaton atop the belt appears highly susceptible to possession by voidsent.

tooltip: Be on your guard─ he's known to be armed!    - Brass Blade
description: Summon your wind-up weapon minion. Somewhat buggy.
name: Wind-up Weapon

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Scaled-down replicas of armored weapons have long been mass-produced by the Garlean Imperial Army in an effort to train new recruits in the proper methods of magitek deployment and repair.

sources.text: FATE "You Do Know Jack" - Eureka Pyros

tooltip: Curious pointed ears... I wonder where they could have come from, kupo?    - Mogleo
description: Summon your wind-up Elvaan minion. Remarks relating to a certain people's perpetually dour facial expressions are best kept to oneself.
name: Wind-up Elvaan

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: A stack of dusty tomes and a healthy imagination served as inspiration for this automaton designed to depict an Elvaan─possible (but unprobable) ancestor of the Elezen. He wears a blue cotehardie rendered in painstaking—and pointless—detail by his Sharlayan creator.

tooltip: Hurry up and knock some sense into Seiryu's noggin!    - Kamaitachi
description: Summon your Seitei minion. Dragon-ness is in the eye of the beholder.
name: Seitei

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: While the true Seiryu has been documented as being more serpent than dragon, this replica of the azure auspice bears a striking resemblance to Kirin (though assurances have been made that this design decision was by no means a cost-cutting measure).

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Deep-sea Site 7, Sea of Ash 2, Sea of Ash 3, Nald'thal's Pipe, The Isle of Sacrament

tooltip: He seemed...odd. Well, odder than usual.    - Cocobezi
description: Summon your abroader otter minion. Hobbies include playing and having fun on an island in the sun.
name: Abroader Otter

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: Legend tells of a right mad otter who, dissatisfied with the fare of his home waters, bought a ship and made south for more bountiful seas. There, he ate like a king...until his boat sank in a storm, leaving the slippery pup alone on stranger tides.

tooltip: I need not explain what a needle is, I trust?    - Redolent Rose
description: Summon your hedgehoglet minion. Only your selfless love and affection can keep him blissfully dilemma-free.
name: Hedgehoglet

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: For centuries, hedgehogs have been considered a delicacy in the Far East, their succulent flesh supped upon by prince and pauper alike. An influx of Western traders more interested in keeping the pups as pets, however, has all but put an end to this grisly tradition.

tooltip: Thin skin and big mouths make for an uneasy combination.    - Hunter-scholar
description: Summon your baby gremlin minion. Feeding after midnight may result in injury. Yours.
name: Baby Gremlin

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK by all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Be not fooled by a gremlin's snow-white fur, for its intentions are as black as the night in which it thrives. Unlike more common stock, this particular breed appears to be resistant to both light and water, making them perfect pets for someone who doesn't mind a bit of mischief.

tooltip: Yes, you─with the long neck.    - Tsukumo
description: Summon your dhalmel calf minion. Oddly short yet alarmingly tall.
name: Dhalmel Calf

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

enhanced_description: Considering this young specimen was most likely bred in captivity for the purpose of research, it is nothing short of a miracle that the calf has managed to survive the harsh environment of Eureka for as long as it has.

tooltip: Fu, fu, fu... Be nice, Don.    - Tifa
description: Summon your wind-up Tifa minion. Not the wrong person.
name: Wind-up Tifa

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: A gravity-defying rendition of the legendary bartending brawler, carved with tender loving care by a seven-fingered craftsman who is oft overheard mumbling to himself, “Words aren't the only way to tell someone how you feel.”

tooltip: Everyone'll think you a ghost!    - Erapi Taropi
description: Summon your Little Yang minion. Every now and then he gets a little bit closer.
name: Little Yang

verminion.skill_description:
Renders action party immune to all attacks.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: One half of a pair of (literally) animated decorations you stumbled across during the All Saints' Wake festivities. Members of the Continental Circus are at a loss as to why this spry specter appears to have a will of its own, though “possession” is high on their list of theories.

tooltip: Are we really sleepin' at a graveyard? 'Cause I'm afraid of ghosts...    - Hal
description: Summon your Little Yin minion. Turn around.
name: Little Yin

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: One half of a pair of (literally) animated decorations you stumbled across during the All Saints' Wake festivities. Members of the Continental Circus are at a loss as to why this sullen specter appears to have a will of its own, though “possession” is high on their list of theories.

tooltip: Well, Alpha certainly seems keen.    - Cid
description: Summon your wind-up Alpha minion. Kweh-ing along under some distant sky.
name: Wind-up Alpha

verminion.skill_description: Transports action party to the central summoning Gate.

enhanced_description: Crafted at the Garlond Ironworks, this miniature reproduction of your faithful (if not somewhat deformed) companion was gifted to you by engineer Jessie Jaye upon your triumphant return from the Alphascape.

tooltip: There will come a time when we must confront Suzaku.    - Genbu
description: Summon your scarlet peacock minion. Prettier than your average peacock, and several times as flammable.
name: Scarlet Peacock

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Peafowl have long been admired in the Far East for their brilliant plumage, but it is their penchant for hunting venomous vilekin that has earned them reverence typically reserved for kami. As such, effigies of the birds are believed to bring their owners good fortune.

tooltip: Such simple creatures, rats.    - Charibert
description: Summon your capybara pup minion. Loves bath time, and you.
name: Capybara Pup

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

enhanced_description: Known in Hingashi as the “onitenjikunezumi” (quite liberally translated as “Near Eastern demon rat”), this rodent auspice of unknown age has developed a fondness for Far Eastern hot springs, and will spend days in the restorative waters if not reminded to come out and eat.

tooltip: Soon, Omega, soon... I will see you rise again!    - Nero tol Scaeva
description: Summon your OMG minion. Weird. Technological. Fascinating.
name: OMG

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while inflicting a weakness to **monsters**.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Despite a striking resemblance to the extra-dimensional mechanical monstrosity that nearly ended your life, this miniature model of Omega does naught but follow in your wake. Wedge of the Garlond Ironworks posits it may have been created to observe your behavior.

tooltip: I was almost certain you'd want to muddy the waters.    - Jessie
description: Summon your mudpie minion. At last, portable filth.
name: Mudpie

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 70%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: A thick, brown mass of living effluence squeezed forth from one of the horror Tokkapchi's many hidden orifices. Though the squirt stinks of sopping sod, one might find themselves pressed to deny the amorphous alluvium is anything but adorable.

sources.text: Attend a Ceremony of Eternal Bonding (Gold/Platinum)

tooltip: Wh-What have you done with my bride!?    - Vannes
description: Summon your bridesmoogle minion. What is a blushing bride without a dutiful bridesmoogle to scatter petals in her general vicinity?
name: Bridesmoogle

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 10.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Moogles serving the Sanctum of the Twelve claim the magicked poppets (provided with purchase of a lavish Ceremony of Eternal Bonding) are guaranteed to bring happiness. Conveniently offer no refunds if you do not hap upon said happiness.

tooltip: I wasn't joking, by the way. About the moogle punching.    - Sidurgu
description: Summon your Taoist moogle minion. The mogpath that can be spoken of is not the true mogpath, kupo.
name: Taoist Moogle

verminion.skill_description: Knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Enrei, acolyte to renowned Far Eastern monk, Master Togen, is believed to have handcrafted this quaint automaton for a kind adventurer who once lent her aid to the pair. How it ended up for sale in a foreign market remains a mystery.

tooltip: Ungodly swine! I would sooner *die* than surrender to you!    - Vault Priest
description: Summon your Poogie minion. Beloved by hunters, though the feeling is not always mutual.
name: Poogie

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

enhanced_description: Many a hunter from lands both near and far has proclaimed this tiny piglet “cute enough to eat.” Not literally, of course. Alright, sometimes literally, but not this time. There will be no eating of Poogie, and that is final.

sources.text: The New King On The Block

tooltip: They allowed him to bring the sum of his skills to bear...or maybe *cat*, on his foes.    - Gerolt
description: Summon your Palico minion. Very punny.
name: Palico

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Hailing from a land so distant it does not appear on any map, this catlike hunter has traveled to far eastern Othard in pursuit of his quarry─the fire-breathing Rathalos. How he came to fight by your side is a story better told over a roast leg of wyvern.

tooltip: Ages ago, there lived a female mage of no small repute who was known by all sorts of unsavory epithets.    - Gerolt
description: Summon your wind-up Tarutaru minion. Remarks relating to a certain people's stature and the diminutiveness thereof are best kept to oneself.
name: Wind-up Tarutaru

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: A stack of dusty tomes and a healthy imagination served as inspiration for this automaton designed to depict the Tarutaru─supposed ancestor of the Lalafell. She wears a gaudy vermilion cloak rendered in painstaking—and pointless—detail by her Sharlayan creator.

tooltip: The sapling is well on its way to becoming a tree.    - Beatin
description: Summon your copycat bulb minion. The only companion you need if you want no other companions.
name: Copycat Bulb

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: Swaddled in crimson cloth and transfixed with an all-too-familiar earring, this shambling seedkin─seemingly fallen from the infamously fetid Cassie─reeks of rotting rutabagas and sour spirits.

tooltip: She's braver than she looks.    - Lyse
description: Summon your wind-up Cirina minion. Hungry for divine guidance. Also buuz.
name: Wind-up Cirina

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Commissioned for the Rising to promote interest in Xaela culture, this fully operational automaton was designed with painstaking detail, using the Mol youth Cirina as a model.

tooltip: Are you some kind of lesser dragon, kupo?    - Mogzin
description: Summon your frilled dragon minion. Also known as the *chlamydosaurus* but...uh, yeah.
name: Frilled Dragon

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Tree-dwellers by nature, frilled dragons only descend to hunt, using their powerful rear legs to propel them forward at speeds that rival most Lalafell. When intimidated, they will spread out the spiked frills adorning their necks, hoping to frighten would-be predators.

tooltip: They can scarce make do without their lanterns.    - Armelle
description: Summon your clockwork lantern minion. Hands-free illumination for the busy insomniac.
name: Clockwork Lantern

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Seeing as collaborations are now all the rage in Eorzea, it did not take long for the tinkers of Eshtaime's Lapidaries to find their way to Frondale's Phrontistery to see what madness their collective minds could conceive. (A lantern. They made a lantern.)

tooltip: Is the khatun woman or man? A stupid question. She is Sadu.    - Koko
description: Summon your wind-up Sadu minion. Will most likely not call any of your companions a stunted chuluu.
name: Wind-up Sadu

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all enemies within range. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

enhanced_description: There once lived a young Dotharli warrior who dreamed of taking the khatun into his arms and, well, doing things that young Dotharli warriors dream of doing. He quickly realized he valued his life and instead crafted this less imposing stand-in.

tooltip: You're not related or something, are you?    - Lyse
description: Summon your wind-up Magnai minion. Ever in search of true love.
name: Wind-up Magnai

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 10% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

enhanced_description: When, after countless moons, their most radiant brother could still not find a suitable wife, several of the Oronir visited Kugane to have poppets created in Magnai's likeness. As of this writing, the outspoken leader remains alone.

tooltip: But deep down, I knew that Mummy and Daddy were never coming back.    - T'kebbe
description: Summon your wind-up Zhloe minion. Cannot thank you enough, but will certainly try.
name: Wind-up Zhloe

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

enhanced_description: Impressed with Zhloe's tireless efforts at the orphanage, a craftsman employed by Rowena's House of Splendors created an automaton version of the altruist and gifted it to her sister, Khloe...who silently added it to her table of rewards.

sources.text: Item code included with Stormblood Original Soundtrack

tooltip: And I am but the moon.    - Lebrassoir
description: Summon your wind-up Tsukuyomi minion. Barren waters, heed unto the tide.
name: Wind-up Tsukuyomi

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Conscripted into the imperial army, only to be handed over to Eorzean Alliance officials in an unreported prisoner exchange, one humble goldsmith celebrated his regained freedom how most goldsmiths do─he crafted a lifelike replica of the Lady of the Moon, Tsukuyomi.

tooltip: I am happy to have met some- one so delici─deft of hand.    - Cirina
description: Summon your attendee #777 minion. Wasshoi, yes, yes.
name: Attendee #777

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 20.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Gyoshin labored through several nights to fincraft this tiny Namazu (though the happi stitchwork is clearly Gyorei's). He intended to make it in the likeness of the 777th attendee, but soon lost count, so model selection was ultimately random.

tooltip: A construct born of desperation and denial.    - Penitent Heretic
description: Summon your Construct 8 minion. Batteries not included.
name: Construct 8

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack 5 times the potency of the caster's ATK.

enhanced_description: Inoperative when discovered in the Clockwork City of Goug, the queer device whirred to life when a crystal was inserted under its chest plate. As long as the crystal is not replaced with auracite, the automaton should prove harmless.

tooltip: It seems this year shall belong to the monkey after all!    - Saru Doshin
description: Summon your magic monkey minion. King of monkeys. Equal of heaven. Inspirer of “awww.”
name: Monkey King

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: A miniature doppelganger of Qitian Dasheng magically brought into being by the ancient auspice himself. Originally used by the monkey king to cozen corrival and companion alike, now it merely serves to act adorable as it hovers nearby its new owner.

tooltip: Looking to make a new frrriend, are we?    - Nanaa Mihgo
description: Summon your wind-up Mithra minion. Opinions on how Miqo'te rate compared to their supposed ancestors are best kept to oneself.
name: Wind-up Mithra

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: A stack of dusty tomes and a healthy imagination served as inspiration for this automaton designed to depict the Mithra─supposed ancestor of the Miqo'te. She wears a traditional scorpion harness rendered in painstaking—and pointless—detail by her Sharlayan creator.

sources.text: FATE "The Shadow over Anemos" - Eureka Anemos

tooltip: By the Twelve, what a hideous, monstrous abomination!    - The Impresario
description: Summon your Prince of Anemos minion. Cute and cudgely.
name: The Prince Of Anemos

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Much to the chagrin of his father─the Lord of Anemos─the young heir has yet to outgrow the odd habit of concealing cudgels and using them to bludgeon anyone who dares question his merits. Thankfully, an absence of thew leaves his lively blows lacking.

tooltip: Those hard scales, those claws...that puny body. Are you some kind of lesser dragon, kupo?    - Mogzin
description: Summon your wind-up Fafnir minion. Protective eyewear highly recommended.
name: Wind-up Fafnir

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Why the scholar who crafted this mechanical marvel felt that an already deadly dragon need carry a sword (and a legendary one, at that) remains unclear. When questioned, he simply refused to alter the design and began muttering about “drop rates.”

tooltip: Either that was a trick of the light, or that statue just moved...    - Shigure
description: Summon your private moai minion. It's watching you, watching you, watching you.
name: Private Moai

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **gadget**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Carved from the remnants of a larger statue found deep beneath the Ruby Sea, the reasons why or even how it can propel itself remain unknown. Rumors of bright rings pouring forth from the effigy's mouth, however, are largely exaggerated.

tooltip: Personally, I've always had a thing for a motley.    - Cornell
description: Summon your motley egg minion. The tiny Archon inside is certain to kickstart your heart.
name: Motley Egg

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: As thanks for aiding Jihli Aliapoh in the retrieval of several stolen eggs, the original Egg Dreamer has gifted you with an eggspertly crafted automaton featuring Radcliffe the Red, famed first Archon of the Sixth Umbral Era.

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of the Revolution -Western Memories-

tooltip: Surely Yotsuyu has crossed the line now...    - Alisaie
description: Summon your wind-up Yotsuyu minion. For that delicious disdain you never knew you needed.
name: Wind-up Yotsuyu

verminion.skill_description: Sets a trap which can be activated by button after 10 seconds. When triggered, it delivers an attack with a potency of 180 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Searching for artistic inspiration, a goldsmith chanced to see an imported painting of a Doman beauty. The woman was apparently a renowned courtesan, and her exquisitely haughty features so enthralled him that he decided to immortalize her in mammet form.

tooltip: Genbu may be the oldest, but Byakko's got to be the fuzziest.    - Kamaitachi
description: Summon your Byakko cub minion. Got to be the fuzziest.
name: Byakko Cub

verminion.skill_description: Knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: While not the actual progeny of the thousand-year-old auspice lord, this eponymous recreation (in newborn form) is sought after by Hingans hoping to see their luck turn for the better.

tooltip: Someone bring the snake!    - Fordola rem Lupis
description: Summon your wind-up Ananta minion. Why did it have to be a snake?
name: Wind-up Ananta

verminion.skill_description: Restores 200 HP to all allies within range (250 if the ally is a **poppet**).

enhanced_description: The ex-Gatekeeper sapper who crafted this doll claims her model was a recently molted Sarisha─new scales glistening in the sun. Proceeds from the sale of each piece are used as remuneration to those who aid the battlemaids in their endeavors.

tooltip: Within these whiskers lies unbound potential.    - Old Namazu Master
description: Summon your Gold Whisker minion. Beckons you to enter his barrel of sin, but don't go in.
name: The Gold Whisker

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: This gaudy rendition of a Namazu is not actually solid gold, but merely a wooden automaton adorned with gold leaf. Its creator, however, hopes that will be enough to fool trade ships from the West to import his “lucky catfish.”

sources.text: Subaquatic Voyages - Deep-sea Site 3, The Umbrella Narrow, The Cobalt Shoals, Deep-sea Site 5, The Upwell, Glutton's Belly, Sea of Jade 1

tooltip: Tonight we will feast on the jellyfish while my jealous fish of a brother drinks in his tears!    - Nortmoen
description: Summon your aurelia polyp minion. Lighter than air─er...water.
name: Aurelia Polyp

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: Hitching a ride in the ballast tank of a submersible proved an enlightening experience for this infant wavekin, allowing it to listen in on the incessant mumblings of the vessel's pilot─a mammet voyager tasked with taking an audio log of all discoveries made.

tooltip: Bright as a lamp, brave as a lion.    - Haermaga
description: Summon your komainu minion. Part lion, part dog, all lion-dog.
name: Komainu

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

enhanced_description: Believed to ward the places from intruders with evil intent, statues of these mythical lion-dog creatures are oft erected at the gates of sacred locations such as shrines. When paired with another, they will always face forward.

tooltip: Don't talk to me! Talk to the cat...or the weasel.    - Tataru
description: Summon your white whittret minion. Once you pop...
name: White Whittret

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: This young male weasel with fur as yellow? as the winter's first snow once dreamed of becoming a pupil of the great auspice Kamaitachi. However, upon witnessing the Warrior of Light's prowess in Hells' Lid, he decided he would be better off siding with the latter.

tooltip: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have an appointment with Kefka!    - Locke Cole
description: Summon your wind-up Kefka minion. Just can't believe it? Believe it!
name: Wind-up Kefka

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Other than a vague claim by Y'shtola that the doll you discovered in Omega's Sigmascape seems “eerily familiar,” none of your companions can recall ever hearing of a wicked jester known as Kefka, be it in history books or children's tales.

tooltip: How do you hope to survive with even more beaks to feed?    - Sanu Vanu
description: Summon your tengu doll minion. And you know what they say about the size of a doll's nose.
name: Tengu Doll

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%. 
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: A doll made in the likeness of a legendary Far Eastern creature, surprisingly animated for an inanimate object─a mystery Far Eastern folk would attribute to the mischievous tengu. Much like how a coveted piece of gear boasting five materia slots suddenly becomes a doll.

tooltip: There is no denying that he has a presence...    - Haname
description: Summon your wind-up Hien minion. Be proud, my new owner. Be proud.
name: Wind-up Hien

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Under imperial rule, Doman dollmakers were forbidden from crafting automata such as the kiyofusa, but this did not stop one brave soul from honoring the popular young Lord Hien with a mammet in his likeness. Its creator can rightly be proud!

tooltip: Wait till the Flame General hears about this!    - M'naago
description: Summon your dress-up Raubahn minion. Detachable arm optional.
name: Dress-up Raubahn

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Ostensibly produced to commemorate Ala Mhigo's liberation, this avatar of the Flame General was originally meant to serve as an apology for the campaign's troubled start. To that end, it was said to have been programmed to beg forgiveness a dozen different ways.

tooltip: I should very much like to see this “Shinryu” creature for myself.    - Nero tol Scaeva
description: Summon your wind-up Shinryu minion. Exhibits an almost preternatural urge to hide in treasure chests and guard powerful weapons.
name: Wind-up Shinryu

verminion.skill_description: Renders both ally and enemy Shields and Search Eyes inoperable. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

enhanced_description: The designer of this mammet was tasked with recreating the dread-filled moment when Shinryu gains his freedom, bursting forth from a cocoon of light. The result is a rather loose interpretation, to say the least.

tooltip: O Lord Ravana! Master of the Sacred Blades! Wrath of the Colony! Conqueror of the World!    - Gnath Priest
description: Summon your wind-up Ravana minion. Low on low he stands, gazing up to see.
name: Wind-up Ravana

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Desiring that the tale of Ravana's clash with the Warrior of Light be preserved for posterity, a Gnath historian commissioned the Weavers' Guild to recreate the Lord of the Hive as a mammet. Comes complete with Chandrahas and fierce love of battle.

tooltip: Tsukumo is no ordinary puppet. He is of the divine!    - Kabuto
description: Summon your wind-up Kojin minion. Is it green? Is it blue? Or...is it neither?
name: Wind-up Kojin

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

enhanced_description: A mammet made in the likeness of the vessel for the kami Tsukumo, but given a green rather than blue coat of paint in order to differentiate it from the actual divinity. The Blue Kojin are hopeful of making a tidy profit by selling scores of these in Kugane.

tooltip: The plot thickens like a dollop of salamander oil.    - Godbert
description: Summon your axolotl eft minion. Because there truly is nothing more adorable than an oddly Lalafellin face on the body of a moist, frilled salamander.
name: Axolotl Eft

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: The retainer who reeled in this specimen claims it is the fabled hundred-eyed axolotl, but at a glance it is short at least ninety-eight. Nor would the man say where he found the creature. For now, it shall be called an “axolotl eft” until such time as naturalists decide what it actually is.

tooltip: Love makes for the best seasoning.    - Gildon
description: Summon your salt & pepper seal minion. What a seal, what a mighty good seal.
name: Salt & Pepper Seal

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 70% of the maximum value.

enhanced_description: None can say how this seal pup came to be at Loch Seld, but the person who first saw it took to calling it “salt” for the briny water, then someone else came along and added “pepper,” because why not. The rest, as they say, is history.

tooltip: Fool is the man who calls a koala a bear within its hearing.    - Ancient Saying
description: Summon your koala joey minion. Shows no signs of stress or crotch rot, so hug away.
name: Koala Joey

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: This small ursine creature dropped onto the retainer who was cutting down its tree and has apparently decided to see the world. Though ordinarily placid, it can be savage when threatened, and folk are cautioned against─ Awww, look at the adorable little critter!

tooltip: There's a smile made of puppy fat!    - Delivery Moogle
description: Summon your mameshiba minion. Who let the newborn miniature Far Eastern canine specimen out? Who, who, who, who, who!?
name: Mameshiba

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: An unscrupulous merchant passed this pup off as a rare species of miniature dog known as the mameshiba. Such a thing does not exist. Rather than have the hapless owners discover the deception when it grows, it was trained to run away.

sources.text: Eschina - Rhalgr's Reach - 5 Ixion Horns (FATE "A Horse Outside")

tooltip: Brave one! Your loyal steed awaits!    - Voyce
description: Summon your wind-up Ixion minion. A horse is a horse, of course. Except when it is Ixion.
name: Wind-up Ixion

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: In a bid to lure brave (or foolish) adventurers to hunt the legendary steed Ixion, the people of Gyr Abania pitched in coin to have this mammet produced─a handsome reward, they believe, for risking grisly death by impalement and/or lightning.

tooltip: To think you beat a Matanga with just your fists.    - Impressed Dotharl
description: Summon your wind-up Matanga minion. This is not Matanga. Matanga is graceful.
name: Wind-up Matanga

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: A mammet made to resemble a Matanga found in the Hidden Canals of Uznair. Originally clothed, it was divested of its modesty by thieves targeting the jewels that adorned its lavish garments, hence its embarrassment. If only someone would cover up its shame. Shame. Shame.

tooltip: Notorious fugitive wanted dead or alive by the Empire!    - Isse
description: Summon your wind-up Gosetsu minion. Wanted by the Empire...and good little boys and girls across Othard.
name: Wind-up Gosetsu

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Crafted to honor Gosetsu─hero and leader of the oppressed peoples of Far Eastern Doma─this miniature replica is faithful down to the blademaster's sword, Samonji.

tooltip: It was brave of Lyse to remove her mask after so long...    - Alphinaud
description: Summon your wind-up Lyse minion. Most certainly not a repurposed wind-up Yda.
name: Wind-up Lyse

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Tataru's choice of raiment for this lifelike recreation of Ala Mhigo's newest heroine was, by no means, made with the sole intention of confusing the public into believing Lyse was a dancer by profession. Honest.

tooltip: He's not heavy, but gods, the smell...    - Lyse
description: Summon your wind-up Namazu minion. Half cat. Half fish. All fish.
name: Wind-up Namazu

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Not too many summers past, there wasn't a house in all Radz-at-Han that didn't echo with the pitter-patter of Hingan-made wind-up Namazu dolls, their misplaced eyes and bewhiskered lips the source of much mirth in the Near Eastern nation.

tooltip: Death is but the blissful terminus of the lives of the weak.    - Nhazaa Jaab
description: Summon your wind-up Exdeath minion. Most maniacal tree beings bent on world domination are usually not intimidated by turtles. This one is.
name: Wind-up Exdeath

verminion.skill_description:
Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks.
**Duration:** 12s

enhanced_description: Retrieved in the Deltascape, this full-metal automaton is a recreation of a terrible villain appearing in ancient legend. While its scintillant blue armor suggests the figure is a knight, Exdeath was believed to be a powerful warlock born from a tree.

tooltip: Since last we spoke, I've spent every spare moment at the butts.    - Barthovieu
description: Summon your wind-up Bartz minion. I like small Bartz and I cannot lie.
name: Wind-up Bartz

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all enemies within range. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

enhanced_description: The legend of Bartz and his trusty chocobo steed Boko is known far and wide, their journeys inspiring entire generations to adventure. Though, disagreement as to the appropriate spelling of the carefree youth's name has led to many a hurt butz.

tooltip: A red mage must strive to achieve the greatest good.    - X'rhun Tia
description: Summon your wind-up red mage minion. He'd rather be red than dead.
name: Wind-up Red Mage

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Tales of mages dabbling in the schools of both black and white abound, but most end in the adept realizing that she should have focused on a single art rather than allowing hubris to drive her to believe that she might excel in both.

tooltip: The desire to protect and the desire to avenge are opposing forces that can ill be reconciled.    - Alberic
description: Summon your magitek avenger F1 minion. Avenger, assembled!
name: Magitek Avenger F1

verminion.skill_description:
Increases caster ATK by 10 and DEF by 5 for every 5% of HP lost.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: It appears the Empire created these faithful reproductions to train field engineers on how to repair actual avenger-class warmachina. The fact that the selfsame models are sold to imperial children as toys is a telling sign of the invaders' mindset.

tooltip: That chimera must be his latest prize.    - Hildibrand
description: Summon your wind-up chimera minion. Crafted by piecing together the remnants of unsold automata.
name: Wind-up Chimera

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

enhanced_description: It is hard to imagine anyone taking pleasure in creating to-scale replicas of the very abominations that contributed to the end of an entire civilization. Then again, it is so utterly *adorable*.

tooltip: It's like all my namedays have come at once!   - Grynewaht
description: Summon your mock-up Grynewaht minion. Bwahahahaha!
name: Mock-up Grynewaht

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: This anatomically accurate simulacrum of the imperial soldier Grynewaht appears to have been built by magitek engineers to determine the most efficient means by which to incorporate magitek implants into the Roegadyn's body.

tooltip: This will make Khloe's best friend so happy!    - Khloe Aliapoh
description: Summon your wind-up Khloe minion. Because there is nothing wrong with a fully automated mechanical reconstruction of a young girl of three and ten summers.
name: Wind-up Khloe

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: Ever since she began receiving them on her doorstep─one a day, every day, without fail─Khloe Aliapoh can't help but think there is something seriously wrong with whoever is sending her these disturbingly lifelike automata.

tooltip: Her name is Yugiri. Perchance you know of her?    - Ihanami
description: Summon your dress-up Yugiri minion. One Yugiri is never enough.
name: Dress-up Yugiri

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: Inspired by an automaton brought across the sea from faraway Aldenard, a Doman dollmaker set out to see if he could replicate the foreign techniques used to breathe life into the creation, the result being this fairly faithful rendition.

tooltip: There isss naught She would not give.    - Sarisha
description: Summon your wind-up Lakshmi minion. Your, your, your serpentine.
name: Wind-up Lakshmi

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **monster**).

enhanced_description: Created to epitomize Lakshmi's flawless beauty, a certain minstrel prone to wandering flippantly deemed it “not to his liking,” ultimately driving the original craftsman to take his own life, and leaving his apprentice to hastily touch up the features.

tooltip: We are Susano, and in revelry do we rejoice!    - Lord of the Revel
description: Summon your wind-up Susano minion. If the Kojin believe that within every item resides a deity, then who exactly resides inside this automaton?
name: Wind-up Susano

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: With an itsy Yata-no-Kagami in his left hand and a bitsy Ame-no-Murakumo in his right, one might almost forget the miniature Magatama throbbing wildly in this liliputian Lord of the Revel's breast. Almost.

tooltip: The Bismarck is as good as mine.    - H'mhasi Tia
description: Summon your wind-up Bismarck minion. The hairiest whale you will see this fortnight.
name: Wind-up Bismarck

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: Seeing Limsa Lominsa crawling with wind-up Ifrits, Titans, Ramuhs, even Ravanas, the Bismarck proprietor wondered why there were still no automata designed in the likeness of his establishment's namesake, and so commissioned one made.

tooltip: Empty bellies send blood aboiling!    - Qiqirn Bandit
description: Summon your wind-up meateater minion. Watch out boys, he'll (literally) chew you up.
name: Wind-up Meateater

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

enhanced_description: This fully functioning automaton was discovered in the pack of a Qiqirn bandit slain on the Hunt. Why a Qiqirn was carrying a copy of itself on its person is a question you *could* ask yourself, but as they say, “ignorance is bliss.”

tooltip: We will need wine...and sparrow-stuffed pheasant.    - Jannequinard
description: Summon your road sparrow minion. This house sparrow's home is on the road. Sparrow.
name: Road Sparrow

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Tired of his humdrum life back in Yanxia, this former house sparrow set off on the journey of a lifetime, finally arriving several moons later in Bardam's Mettle, where he fell in with a flock of ferocious yol and learned the true meaning of freedom.

tooltip: Matron's teats, those turtles are huge!    - Waemlydir
description: Summon your Ghido minion. There is most likely a logical explanation as to why this aged turtle can navigate the skies. Most likely.
name: Ghido

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Some say this denizen of the Sirensong Sea has seen upwards of seven hundred summers, and in that time his hate for blue-blazoned armor has only grown. As for why, no one knows.

tooltip: He seemed...odd. Well, odder than usual.    - Cocobezi
description: Summon your odder otter minion. Is there anything odder than an otter who lives out of water?
name: Odder Otter

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **critters** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Otters of the Far East are highly cunning creatures, some scholars having ventured as far as to claim the rodents' intelligence is, in fact, comparable to that of a Qiqirn, despite lacking the latter's propensity for spoken communication.

tooltip: Now there's a trick what took some bollocks.    - Perimu Haurimu
description: Summon your Bom Boko minion. An adorable raccoon dog pup with a big heart and even bigger testicles.
name: Bom Boko

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Supposedly Far Eastern raccoon dogs are nothing like the raccoons of Eorzea, shunning a life of rifling through garbage for one of transmogrification into everyday kitchenware such as tea crocks. Go figure.

tooltip: It has been too long since I last dined on tiger.    - Masatsuchi
description: Summon your Tora-jiro minion. His name suggests that this tiny tiger cub has an older brother. His parents deny everything.
name: Tora-jiro

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: Being saved by the selfsame hunter who brutally slayed your family for a sack of coin and a punny title can be awkward for a growing tiger cub. On one hand, he brutally slayed your family. On the other, he provides you bowls of rich, tasty cream.

sources.text: Eschina - Rhalgr's Reach - 3 Sassho-seki Fragments (FATEs "Outfoxed" and "Foxy Lady")

tooltip: The hungry fox starves staring at the bull's testicles.    - Cirina
description: Summon your fox kit minion. His devotion toward you will prove fair and balanced.
name: Fox Kit

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **critter**).

enhanced_description: Despite its appearance, this fox kit is actually the offspring of a thousand–year–old vulpine spirit yet incapable of taking on the body of a man that it may seduce its prey into relinquishing their very souls. Or not. There truly is no way to tell.

tooltip: He had a pair o' Sphairai crafted─fists what looked like coeurls.    - Gerolt
description: Summon your Ivon Coeurlfist doll minion. Technically “Coeurl*paw*.”
name: Ivon Coeurlfist Doll

verminion.skill_description:
Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: A complete dismantling of the coeurl-fisted caricature shows that, unlike the automata of Ul'dah, the puffered paunch of this poppet contains naught but cotton and straw, leading one to wonder...how in the seven hells does it walk!?

tooltip: Won't get nowhere up its crack, yunz won't, not with that piddly bomb.    - 13th Order Alchemist Ga Zi
description: Summon your bombfish minion. He will give you an offer that can't be defused.
name: Bombfish

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 20.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Given its name after a fisher claimed to witness the wavekin explode after tossing it on a grill, the bombfish is, in fact, neither related to bombs of voidsent origin or even that combustible.

tooltip: His tiny minions won't stand a chance!    - Haermaga
description: Summon your tiny tatsunoko minion. If the Hingan word for sea horse is tatsunoko, would that make this a sea pony? *Your* little sea pony?
name: Tiny Tatsunoko

verminion.skill_description: Triggers an enemy trap as if it were your own. If the trap deals physical damage, then potency is increased by 150%.

enhanced_description: A single ilm to the right or left and this cute creature would have been kebab. Fate, however, intervened, and now the wavekin follows its would-be transfixer─the tiny tyke having taken quite well to the upper world's drier climes.

tooltip: You can lead a chocobo to water...    - Redolent Rose
description: Summon your castaway chocobo chick minion. Currently without a name. “Wilson” recommended.
name: Castaway Chocobo Chick

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 40%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: You won't hear this from his beak, but the chocobo chick you rescued from the sea's slippery grasp cannot actually swim─the only thing keeping the bird afloat is a life preserver some kind sailor tossed from his ship before sailing off into the sunset.

tooltip: I still don't understand why a horn is so important to you.    - Ohl Deeh
description: Summon your pegasus colt minion. Unfortunately does not emit rainbows from any of its orifices.
name: Pegasus Colt

verminion.skill_description:
Increases speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Having lost his mother, this winged steed from the Diadem has settled upon a decidedly wingless bipedal surrogate to lead him somewhere over the rainbow.

tooltip: Don't be a baby! Get a grip!    - Sisipu
description: Summon your baby brachiosaur minion.
name: Baby Brachiosaur

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **poppets** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: This adorable automaton was cobbled together by a sky pirate (who had once apprenticed as a goldsmith) after claiming to have spotted one of the mythical creatures from the deck of his crew's airship on a journey deep into the Diadem.

sources.text: Item code included with The Art of Ishgard -The Scars of War-

tooltip: I somehow doubt that Hraesvelgr will be pleased to see us.    - Alphinaud
description: Summon your wind-up Hraesvelgr minion. Comes complete with overhead nameplate to help with spelling.
name: Wind-up Hraesvelgr

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: An uncanny attention to detail has been paid in the creation of this automaton, commissioned to help Ishgardians remember a time when hate did not rule the hearts of man and dragon. This is especially true of Hraesvelgr's eyes in which can be seen both love and sadness.

tooltip: Pup that he is, having a trophy will mean much to him.    - Bloeidin
description: Summon your faepup minion. Every dog has its fae.
name: Faepup

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: Whelped in the blackness of the void, and raised to be a proud and merciless killer, this deceptively adorable pup does not (obviously) take well to companionship. The rare exception, however, has been made for those who have shown they will not back down in fear.

sources.text: Mama Said Knock You Out III

tooltip: Another wolf pup itchin' to get in the ring, are ye?    - Maelstrom Drill Sergeant
description: Summon your hellpup minion. Not all children are products of their environment. This one, however, is.
name: Hellpup

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Whelped in the blackness of the void, only to be abandoned by her mother, this hellpup survived by devouring the flesh of the litter's remaining hounds. Since then, she has wandered alone, searching for someone to love.

tooltip: I'm ready!    - Yuna
description: Summon your wind-up Yuna minion. “My will is strong!” So is this automaton's resistance to rust.
name: Wind-up Yuna

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **poppet**).

enhanced_description: Peoples of the Far East tell the tale of a beautiful summoner who embarked on a perilous journey to deliver restless souls to the afterlife and thus bring peace to the world. Her name was Yuna...

sources.text: Magic Pot - The Isles of Umbra - 1 Hi-Elixir

tooltip: I am but the moon which reflects his radiance.    - Lebrassoir
description: Summon your wind-up moon minion. /poke to adjust elevation. /point to inform others of its location. /blowkiss to get strange looks from passersby.
name: Wind-up Moon

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **gadget**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Following a report that excessive exposure to the bright light emitted by wind-up suns may be causing the very blemishes that Ul'dahn mesdames thought to hide, demand for a less-radiant alternative skyrocketed, ultimately giving rise to the wind-up moon.

tooltip: The anima took on a corporeal form!?    - Ardashir
description: Summon your anima minion. From your heart and from your hand. Finally people will understand your intentions.
name: Anima

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Ardashir fashioned this new body utilizing the anima's original soulstone. No longer limited to the immediate vicinity of the anima weapon, it is free to explore the realm at your side. Whether it will grow to become a real boy or girl, however, remains to be seen.

tooltip: *You* are the angel of beauty who gave me my life and stole away with my heart!    - Hortefense
description: Summon your angel of mercy minion. Come and save me tonight.
name: Angel Of Mercy

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

enhanced_description: A missing tinker has recently returned to Ul'dah claiming to have been “rescued by an angel.” While most believe the man to merely be a recipient of a passerby mage's kindness, he has since dedicated his life to creating automata in the image of his heavenly savior.

sources.text: If I Could Turn Back Time

tooltip: I daresay you have the potential to be an exemplary inspector someday!    - Hildibrand
description: Summon your Gigi minion. Also known as Vivi...but his secret is safe with you.
name: Gigi

verminion.skill_description: Delivers 6% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

enhanced_description: The secret to the lost art of temporal magicks is believed to be buried deep within this ancient automaton created by the legendary Sharlayan archmagus Quan. Vitality levels are dangerously low due to a power drainage necessary to save the lives of his companions.

sources.text: Item code included with The Far Edge of Fate Original Soundtrack

tooltip: Eternal is a dragon's rage, Dread Nidhogg's wrath did span an age.    - The Wandering Minstrel
description: Summon your wind-up Nidhogg minion. Now with more eyes.
name: Wind-up Nidhogg

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: An enemy of the Holy See for over a thousand years, it is difficult for the people of Ishgard to not experience feelings of intense loathing when setting their eyes upon this harmless replica.

tooltip: Estinien... You gave your word...    - Lady Iceheart
description: Summon your wind-up Estinien minion. Absolutely, positively not possessed by an evil dragon bent on ridding the world of mankind.
name: Wind-up Estinien

verminion.skill_description: Transports action party to the central summoning Gate.

enhanced_description: It is said the creators of this lifelike replica spent several days quarreling over what color to paint the now-infamous dragoon's armor─blue or red. After consultation with Vault officials, the decision was made to proceed with the former.

tooltip: Ohl Deeh, I was made to believe you could hurl boulders through the skies with but a flick of your powerful claws.    - Tarresson
description: Summon your wind-up Ohl Deeh minion. 100% less subject to violent mood swings than its living counterpart.
name: Wind-up Ohl Deeh

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: This remarkably true-to-life replica of his bosom buddy Ohl Deeh was carefully handcrafted by Master Mogzin not as an expression of his undying friendship, but “to scare his wits all the way to Weston Waters.”

tooltip: If the Shadow Queen were to return, it would have dire consequences for this entire star!    - Cait Sith
description: Summon your wind-up Scathach minion. Surprisingly visible despite being a queen of the shadows.
name: Wind-up Scathach

verminion.skill_description: Knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: On the sole of her left foot can be seen the inscription, “With this, I profess my love to thee.” The lettering, however, does not match the Eorzean used during the latter Fourth Astral Era, suggesting that the automaton was crafted far after the fall of Mhach.

tooltip: He may be a pup, but he'll likely make a meal of anyone what gets close to him.    - R'kontai
description: Summon your bullpup minion. Runt of the canis pugnaces litter.
name: Bullpup

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **monsters**.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: The Garleans have a long history of canine breeding that extends far back into the nation's days as a republic. The intent of this practice is to produce fearless, loyal killing machines, and those that fail to display the desired traits are...discarded.

tooltip: Let's see how tough you are.    - Lulu
description: Summon your wind-up Lulu minion. “Magic has no limits.” Nor does the list of exciting things you can do with this automaton.
name: Wind-up Lulu

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Peoples of the Far East tell the tale of a powerful mage and master of puppets who would rain destruction down on any that might harm her companions as they made their journey to save the world. Her name was Lulu...

tooltip: Bring it on!    - Rikku
description: Summon your wind-up Rikku minion. “Victory is ours!” This automaton is yours.
name: Wind-up Rikku

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Peoples of the Far East tell the tale of a plucky young lass with a fiery heart and questionable taste in finery who accompanied a summoner on her journey to bring peace to the world. That young lass's name was Rikku...

sources.text: Item code included with Encyclopaedia Eorzea

tooltip: I do not expect all moogles to be well versed in Roegadyn naming conventions.    - Klynthota
description: Summon your Namingway minion. Do not think this means you can now change your character name.
name: Namingway

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: While it is whispered that this cheerful vagrant is the sole surviving member of a tribe hailing from none other than the moon, most see Namingway for who he is─a queer fellow with a penchant for giving all he meets absurd nicknames then jotting them down in his mysterious journal.

tooltip: Edda, you're so slow, you'd lose a footrace to a tree slug.    - Liavinne
description: Summon your wind-up Edda minion. Because true love never dies.
name: Wind-up Edda

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: While not confirmed, it is thought this eerily lifelike replica of Edda Blackbosom was created by a former companion of the now-deceased(?) adventurer. Those who have possessed the dark fetish assert that its hair grows at night when no one is looking.

sources.text: An Ending To Mark A New Beginning

tooltip: I shall allow no foe to harm the lovely Moenbryda.    - Thancred
description: Summon your wind-up Moenbryda minion. Destined to die a hero...and live on as a mechanized servitor.
name: Wind-up Moenbryda

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 50%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: This finely detailed tribute to Moenbryda was crafted in secret by none other than Urianger following the untimely passing of his beloved companion. Though known for her warm and jovial nature, the resolve within this doll's eyes perhaps speaks to the strength he admired in her.

tooltip: Is it just my imagination, or is Alisaie staring daggers at me?    - Alphinaud
description: Summon your dress-up Alisaie minion. Now 120% more discernable from the wind-up Alphinaud minion.
name: Dress-up Alisaie

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 40.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: After finding that she could simply not tell her wind-up Alisaie and Alphinaud automata apart, Tataru went about modifying the former's garments, creating something both new and bold...all while keeping manufacturing costs at an absolute minimum!

tooltip: I say, did you not see Thancred anywhere? I'm beginning to fear for the fellow...    - Papalymo
description: Summon your dress-up Thancred minion. Take a walk on Thancred's wild side...but with fewer nutkins.
name: Dress-up Thancred

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: Several moons in the wild, removed from civilization and forced to adopt a more bestial means of survival transformed not only Thancred's body, but his mind. Due to the limitations of clockwork technology, this automaton only depicts those changes to the former.

sources.text: Alexander - The Soul Of The Creator
Alexander - The Soul Of The Creator (Savage)

tooltip: From what I understand, this “Alexander” was active for no more than a few seconds.    - Biggs
description: Summon your toy Alexander minion. A special something for all good Illuminati gobs and girls.
name: Toy Alexander

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **monster**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: At first dismissed as a quaint oddity, it has recently been discovered that the Illuminati use this fully functional replica of the primal Alexander to educate young goblins in the fields of metallurgy and engineering.

tooltip: He is a giant amongst boars, unrivaled in strength and savagery, and ruler over all his kind.    - Ywain
description: Summon your shaggy shoat minion. This adorable piglet will gore your heart and leave you yearning for more.
name: Shaggy Shoat

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (30 if the ally is a **critter**).
**Duration:** 9s

enhanced_description: The orphaned offspring of one of the many wild boars that inhabit the deep ravines of Xelphatol. Having lost its mother, the tiny beast seeks someone of unmatched strength and boundless courage to teach it the ways of survival. Until that someone is found, you will do most nicely.

tooltip: The business of which I speak involves keeping an eye on that troublesome troupe of entertainers.    - Godriquelain
description: Summon your Continental eye minion. I see you. You see me.
name: Continental Eye

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Cursed with a weak vessel upon its arrival in the corporeal realm, this malformed and maladroit voidsent was summarily captured and put to work at the Continental Circus...until being sold for a handful of coin to a new owner─ you.

tooltip: Shoot!
description: Summon your USApyon minion. A Yo-kai who aims for the moon.
name: USApyon

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: A Yo-kai from across the sea, USApyon hopes to someday venture into space. He uses Vader mode when he is angry.

tooltip: Activating Sleep Mode...
description: Summon your Robonyan F-type minion. It's an upgraded robot that thinks it's a cat.
name: Robonyan F-type

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all enemies within range. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

enhanced_description: An upgraded model of Robonyan, he removed all of his unnecessary functions to become the perfect robot cat.

tooltip: I've got your back!
description: Summon your Hovernyan minion. He may be a wanderer, but he's actually quite dependable.
name: Hovernyan

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Although he is floating, he is actually very down-to-earth. The white mark on his forehead is an honorable battle scar.

tooltip: Heart of a Warrior!
description: Summon your Shogunyan minion. This legendary warrior's armor smells faintly of tuna.
name: Shogunyan

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 30%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: This Yo-kai is Jibanyan's legendary warrior ancestor. He just loves skipjack tuna and carries it around in his armor.

tooltip: Hmph...!
description: Summon your Venoct minion. All of his abilities are truly first class.
name: Venoct

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: An elite Yo-kai who fights with his dragon scarf.

tooltip: Noko noko!
description: Summon your Noko minion. This Yo-kai is one lucky snake!
name: Noko

verminion.skill_description: Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a **monster**).

enhanced_description: Noko is always scared of being seen by humans. Which happens a lot, since it's terrible at hiding.

tooltip: Doggone it!
description: Summon your Manjimutt minion. He hopes to become a CEO someday.
name: Manjimutt

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: A man-faced poodle who enjoys scaring people frightened by a poodle with a man's face.

tooltip: Oh my swirls!
description: Summon your Komajiro minion. He might as well tag along on your adventures as he searches for his older brother.
name: Komajiro

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: Komajiro is Komasan's younger twin. He looks for his runaway brother, but he can't find him anywhere.

tooltip: How ridiculous.
description: Summon your Kyubi minion. He's actually quite charming once you get to know him.
name: Kyubi

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: This fox Yo-kai is one of the strongest Yo-kai around. He can easily erupt with power, like a volcano.

tooltip: Summer fever...
description: Summon your Blizzaria minion. She's a Yo-kai with an immense chilling power.
name: Blizzaria

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **monster**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: A Yo-kai with the power to make temperatures drop, Blizzaria can make snow fall in summer and freeze volcanoes.

tooltip: Hold on to your butler!
description: Summon your Whisper minion. Your very own Yo-kai butler, at your service.
name: Whisper

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: A self-proclaimed “Yo-kai butler.” With the way he talks, you would think him a know-it-all, but he is really a know-nothing.

tooltip: Oh my swirls!
description: Summon your Komasan minion. He got bored with guarding his shrine. Now he wants to guard you.
name: Komasan

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Komasan is a lion-dog that came from a rural area. He often expresses awe when traveling in the city.

tooltip: I'm kind of busy right nyao.
description: Summon your Jibanyan minion. He might take his anger out on passing vehicles.
name: Jibanyan

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: After being run over, Jibanyan was bound to a busy crossroad where he spent his days taking revenge on any passing vehicle that stood in his way.

tooltip: Would you care to attempt a more dextrous deflection?    - Krile
description: Summon your wind-up Krile minion. She is terribly, terribly sorry to have kept you waiting.
name: Wind-up Krile

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **poppet**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: This clockwork contraption has been crafted at the behest of the Adventurers' Guild in celebration of the Rising, Eorzea's annual celebration of rebirth. The enormous feline ears attached to her hood are thought to represent Krile's ability to hear the whispers of the soul.

tooltip: Tataru has truly outdone herself this time.    - Y'shtola
description: Summon your dress-up Y'shtola minion. Now with more aetheric...enhancements?
name: Dress-up Y'shtola

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **critters**.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: This clockwork automaton has been crafted at the behest of the Adventurers' Guild in celebration of the Rising, Eorzea's annual celebration of rebirth. Alphinaud Leveilleur was apparently more than happy to submit a rough sketch for the design, despite never being asked.

tooltip: I keep one eye open at all times, an' two more often than not.    - Baderon
description: Summon your hecteye minion. Got no Hyuran grace, you're an eye without a face.
name: Hecteye

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: This single optic detached from a larger mass of hecteyes finds itself in a constant state of restlessness, given the inability to simultaneously survey its surroundings in all directions. Until it grows more, your eyes will have to suffice.

tooltip: I've decided to follow in your footsteps.    - Sisipu
description: Summon your wind-up sasquatch minion. It thankfully cannot pelt you with its steaming stool.
name: Wind-up Sasquatch

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

enhanced_description: Crafted by the Leatherworkers' Guild, this lifelike clockwork replica of a sasquatch is hoped to bring attention to the creatures' dwindling numbers in the wild.

tooltip: The sultana's pigs've come to wallow!    - Gisfrid the Grinder
description: Summon your Piggy minion. Many have tried casting Esuna on what they thought was a struggling adventurer, only to find they had wasted their magic.
name: Piggy

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: A mysterious bipedal swine given away as a prize after it was discovered gorging itself in the Manderville Gold Saucer kitchens. Assuming he is not a real pig, many have tried poking, unmasking, and dispelling the portly pork's guise... but to no avail.

tooltip: Throw back a guppy today, and reel in ten fish tomorrow.    - N'nmulika
description: Summon your magic bucket minion. A fisherman's best friend. He sloshes instead of slobbers.
name: Magic Bucket

verminion.skill_description:
Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: This curiosity is said to have once belonged to an angler who wanted a bottomless pail that would shadow him hither and yon. Upon releasing a live Nepto Dragon into the markets, he had a change of heart and tossed the bucket back brinewards, never looking back.

tooltip: Oh, do cheer up. Better to die once than live ever in shame.    - Hunt Billmaster
description: Summon your wind-up cheerleader minion. Oh, I think that you've found yourself a cheerleader.
name: Wind-up Cheerleader

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Commissioned by officers stationed in the Wolves' Den, the cheerleader was designed to enkindle the spirits of the arena's competitors. Some have noticed, however, that if a match begins to stagnate, her chants devolve from little lady cheers into Lominsan sailor jeers.

tooltip: A divided Ishgard will not survive.    - Aymeric
description: Summon your wind-up Aymeric minion. His many obligations prevent him from accompanying you on your journeys, but hopefully this dutiful substitute will suffice.
name: Wind-up Aymeric

verminion.skill_description: Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

enhanced_description: Noting the popularity of other clockwork leaders, the Temple Knights attempted to make one of their own beloved commander. The face was so far-removed from the true Aymeric's handsome mien, however, that one of the knights' wives volunteered to sew a new one from scratch.

tooltip: Is it I who am elated... or Saint Shiva?    - Ysayle
description: Summon your wind-up Shiva minion. Renounce the hatreds that consume you, and she will scatter them like sawdust into the wind.
name: Wind-up Shiva

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: When followers of Iceheart heard the Weavers' Guild was creating clockwork effigies, they made the long trek from Ishgard to commission one in the likeness of Saint Shiva. However, the final product was so endearing, they puzzled over whether to pay it solemn tribute or cuddle it.

tooltip: By the radiance of eld be thee judged!    - Ramuh
description: Summon your wind-up Ramuh minion. He's silently judging you.
name: Wind-up Ramuh

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: While Garuda-themed automata flew from the shelves of the Shaded Bower, the Weavers' Guild had already begun work on another local primal. Sylphs were interviewed regarding Ramuh's wizened visage, but none could agree on the length and fullness of his beard.

tooltip: Mother asks that I hunt, but I have never dared to hunt alone.    - Kal Myhk
description: Summon your wind-up dragonet minion. For the adventurer who has always longed to be a mother of dragons.
name: Wind-up Dragonet

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: After learning of Ishgardian artistry, the Moghome moogles' first endeavor was to create a wind-up automaton similar. A plucky dragonet named Kal Myhk volunteered to serve as the model, and even offered some of his scales to provide it a more lifelike texture.

tooltip: But know that she who chases two rabbits catches neither one.    - J'moldva
description: Summon your dwarf rabbit minion. He may have a penchant for nibbling at your neighbor's garden patches.
name: Dwarf Rabbit

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 10 to all enemies within range every second.
**Duration:** 20s
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: After his father was baked into a pie by a farmer's wife for stealing their vegetables, he invoked the time-honored code of rabbit revenge and hopped off to destroy every garden patch he could find.

tooltip: By the blood of voidsent have I ascended to the sublime...     - Calofisteri
description: Summon your wind-up Calofisteri minion. She seems so peaceful. Why don't you keep her with you...FOR ALL ETERNITY!
name: Wind-up Calofisteri

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: This clockwork creation is similar to others made by a deranged Gridanian goldsmith, whose body went missing after he was executed for conjuring the dark arts. Found in the remnants of the city of Mhach, an explorer swore he could hear cackling from behind the crumbling walls.

tooltip: RELEASE THE KRAKEN!    - Captain Madison
description: Summon your calamari minion. (Or is it a trap!?)
name: Calamari

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 and knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Academics visiting Hullbreaker Isle determined, upon discovery of this strange creature, this tiny tentacle is a regenerating arm of a slain kraken. Unlike the hostile body from which it was severed, it bears you no ill will. Rather, this appendage seems to have taken a liking to you...

tooltip: Fancy some feathers... bird brain?    - Gilgamesh
description: Summon your Doman magpie minion. Approximately 3.14159 times more intelligent than the average swallow.
name: Doman Magpie

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Magpies have historically been portrayed as loyal messengers of Menphina, bearing the word of the Lover's favor in war. There are some generals even today who will wait to advance their armies until one of the birds has been sighted on their side of the battlefield.

tooltip: Beings held as gods also exist in what you call the Far East.   - Yugiri
description: Summon your panda cub minion. Untrained in arts both martial and magical, but as scrumptiously adorable as chicken glazed in a tangy orange reduction.
name: Panda Cub

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: So popular are pandas in the Far East, that there are tales of the creatures being promoted to powerful positions within local governmental agencies. This particular mechanical reproduction is thought to have been brought to Eorzea by a Doman wise man.

sources.text: Item code included with Heavensward Original Soundtrack

tooltip: You spoony bard!     - Tellah
description: Summon your spoony bard minion. Although there are many different accounts of what was actually said during the famous altercation, all agree on the single utterance that became his legacy.
name: Spoony Bard

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 20.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: This colorfully outfitted automaton was crafted to resemble the legendary Edward Chris von Muir. The proud descendant of a peerless bard, it was said Edward's voice could unravel the very fabric of magic. The prince of a lost kingdom, he stood against darkness in the name of love.

tooltip: If it were up to me, I'd lock him up and throw the key into Silvertear Lake.     - Biggs
description: Summon your wind-up Nero tol Scaeva minion. Better engineered than the wind-up Cid. In every way.
name: Wind-up Nero Tol Scaeva

verminion.skill_description: Triggers an enemy trap as if it were your own. If the trap deals physical damage, then potency is increased by 150%.

enhanced_description: This automaton incorporates a special mechanism that allows it to grip its weapon more effectively. This revolutionary innovation puts it above any wind-up toy currently in production, especially those crafted by the Garlond Ironworks.

tooltip: Leviathan's scaly arse!     - Wilfalk
description: Summon your wind-up Leviathan minion. Your flesh cannot feed this minion of the deep.
