tooltip: I've got no words to mince with whelps...unless you're here to become a wolf.   - Curious Gorge
description: Summon your wolf pup minion. Idolizes one Gaius van Baelsar for obvious reasons.
name: Wolf Pup

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **critter**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Bred to serve as a war wolf in the Imperial Garlean Army, this pup was rescued before any permanent damage could be done to its playful spirit. He will follow you to the end of the world and back...as long as you toss him an occasional biscuit.

tooltip: I made the grievous error of visiting a great buffalo with a handsaw.   - Godbert
description: Summon your buffalo calf minion. Milk-fed until tender and juicy. Not that anyone would *ever* think of eating him.
name: Buffalo Calf

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 40.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: When the Scions of the Seventh Dawn began clearing out the Waking Sands in preparation for the move to Revenant's Toll, this wide-eyed calf was discovered hiding in a disused linen closet. Though an inquiry was made by the Antecedent herself, it is still not known who was keeping the beast.

tooltip: Each sapling is another glimpse into the wonder of the world around us.   - Fufucha
description: Summon your tiny bulb minion. Some questions, such as why this bulb can walk, are best left unanswered.
name: Tiny Bulb

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: To answer the question, “why can this bulb walk,” one must trace the seedkin's evolution back thousands of generations. Since this guide lacks the space to do so, let us simply say it has something to do with seeking sunlight under the eternal darkness of the Black Shroud's thick canopy.

tooltip: I came expectin' to fight one tonberry, not a whole bloody mess of 'em.   - Soft Marauder
description: Summon your wind-up tonberry minion. Now with 100% less rancor.
name: Wind-up Tonberry

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK and DEF of all allies within range by 40. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: While merely a clockwork toy crafted to resemble the twisted survivors of Nym, owners of similar creations claim waking to find their wind-up tonberries propped upon their chests, wooden knives pressed firmly against their throats.

tooltip: Coeurl got your tongue?   - Wilred
description: Summon your coeurl kitten minion. It will still be several summers before his trademark whiskers grow out.
name: Coeurl Kitten

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Coeurls are extremely proud and defiant creatures, even when young. Faced with insurmountable odds, a coeurl will rarely shy away from a fight, choosing rather to perish in combat than run. This characteristic keeps coeurl numbers low, but ensures the strength of those who survive.

tooltip: I had a feeling you'd be riding up on your golden chocobo.   - Path Companion
description: Summon the princely hatchling minion, the chocobo who would be king.
name: Princely Hatchling

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: A thoroughbred descended from the legendary Veillantif, this noble bird of Ishgard seeks a rider who will not sully his family's name.

tooltip: I trust ye had enough fingers to help ye through the tallyin'.   - Yulgi Honalgi
description: Summon your wind-up cursor minion. Modeled after the ivory glove of Oschon, the Wanderer, does this clockwork hand follow you...or guide you?
name: Wind-up Cursor

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: If we are to believe the slurred ravings of a self-proclaimed goblin theologian deep in his cups, this seemingly inconspicuous white glove is actually the “Hand of Fate” by which all of us are controlled from a dimension beyond the aether.

sources.text: Item code included with Before Meteor Original Soundtrack

tooltip: The lifeblood spilled in Dalamud's name shall be blessed upon his return.   - Foxe
description: Summon your wind-up Dalamud minion. Do not attempt to pry open under any circumstances.
name: Wind-up Dalamud

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: After Dalamud's fall, a wealthy Ul'dahn noble commissioned a famous troupe of musicians to write a dirge for the heroes of Carteneau and play it across Eorzea so that the deeds of the fallen would not be forgotten. This wind-up model of the red moon has naught to do with the dirge.

tooltip: I'd sooner face a vanguard while naked as my nameday!   - Flame Private
description: Summon your model vanguard minion. An exact 1:9 scale replica of a ceruleum-powered magitek vanguard (imperial pilot action figure not included).
name: Model Vanguard

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: Part of the Guildmaster Series, this high-quality replica is so exact in its rendition of the vanguard's build that Garlemald has banned the item's import into the Empire's outlying provinces, for fear the data gleaned from it will be used by rebel forces still active in these lands.

tooltip: Up in the sky, look! It's a bird─ No, it's an airship─ No! It's the inspector!   - Nashu Mhakaracca
description: Summon your wind-up airship minion. A fully operational model of the legendary vessel, the *Invincible*.
name: Wind-up Airship

verminion.skill_description:
Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a **gadget**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Despite it being the first, and most ambitious undertaking by Highwind Skyways founder Tatanora, the *Invincible* actually never took flight─its ten-year construction period plagued by accidents, material shortages, sabotage, and outright incompetence.

tooltip: What may be a few to you was everything to those who died...   - Cait Sith
description: Summon your Cait Sith minion. The ever-extended tail helps the kitten keep his balance.
name: Cait Sith Doll

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: The clockwork rendition of an enigmatic cat spirit from the pages of Midlander mythology, Goldsmiths' Guild guildmaster Serendipity crafted this lifelike figurine to bring joy to those children who were orphaned in the Calamity.

sources.text: Bump On A Log: Immortal Flames

tooltip: Feelings! Maybe she just doesn't feel like part of the team!?   - Wedge
description: Summon your mammet #003U minion─a fully operational clockwork puppet built for the Immortal Flames.
name: Mammet #003U

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 40%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Designed to be a standard-bearer in Immortal Flames company parades, these handcrafted automata were soon decommissioned due to the fact that their small stature ensured that no one could see the flags they carried.

sources.text: Bump On A Log: Order Of The Twin Adder

tooltip: Feelings! Maybe she just doesn't feel like part of the team!?   - Wedge
description: Summon your mammet #003G minion─a fully operational clockwork puppet built for the Order of the Twin Adder.
name: Mammet #003G

verminion.skill_description: Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

enhanced_description: Designed to be a standard-bearer in Order of the Twin Adder company parades, these handcrafted automata were soon decommissioned due to the fact that their small stature ensured that no one could see the flags they carried.

tooltip: Feelings! Maybe she just doesn't feel like part of the team!?   - Wedge
description: Summon your mammet #003L minion─a fully operational clockwork puppet built for the Maelstrom.
name: Mammet #003L

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Designed to be a standard-bearer in Maelstrom company parades, these handcrafted automata were soon decommissioned due to the fact that their small stature ensured that no one could see the flags they carried.

sources.text: Minion Trader - The Gold Saucer - 2,400 Gil

tooltip: Mammets can't even taste food!   - Serendipity
description: Summon your mammet #001 minion─a fully operational clockwork puppet built in a joint effort by the Alchemists' and Goldsmiths' Guilds.
name: Mammet #001

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

enhanced_description: The standard frill-free #001 model is not only the best-selling mammet on the market, but is the blueprint on which all other clockwork servitors are based.

tooltip: The Qiqirn are a nuisance at the best of times.   - Roseline
description: Summon your wind-up Qiqirn minion. As adorable as the real thing, without the ratty odor.
name: Wind-up Qiqirn

verminion.skill_description:
Grants action party the ability to deal extra damage to Arcana Stones.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Once upon a time, there was not a man, woman, or child in all of Limsa Lominsa who did not know the name Zazaroon, mummer extraordinaire. However, a taste for spiced rum, a failed marriage, and several run-ins with the Barracudas saw the Qiqirn fall from the limelight into oblivion.

tooltip: But everywhere the little lambs went, lice were sure to go.   - Chartain
description: Summon your tender lamb minion. Mint jelly optional.
name: Tender Lamb

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: As if predestined, your path crossed with that of the tender lamb's after she was brought to Eorzea from the dark reaches of the Far East by a hitsuji bugyo. Since then, you have been inseparable, the fluffy ball of fleece following your every footstep.

tooltip: Underneath this gear, I'm built like a brick privy!   - Chachabi
description: Summon your demon brick minion. We are all better off not knowing what arcane magicks animate this ordinary stone block.
name: Demon Brick

verminion.skill_description: Knocks back all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: For many years, modern archaeologists did not understand how a seemingly primitive civilization without clockwork or steam technology could build the massive stone structures of Amdapor. Animated bricks, such as the one that has chosen to follow you, may be the missing link.

tooltip: A talking...pudding?   - You
description: Summon your bite-sized pudding minion. Not intended for consumption.
name: Bite-sized Pudding

verminion.skill_description:
Renders the action party immune to all attacks by **poppets**.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Unable to reproduce, puddings increase their number solely via mitosis. Because of this, it is widely believed that all Eorzea's puddings descended from a single entity─a proto-pudding, if you will. This, however, leaves us with the question: whence did the first pudding come?

sources.text: It Was A Very Good Year

tooltip: These goobbues are wont to devour anything and everything.   - Aileen
description: Summon your goobbue sproutling minion. Has been known to attack kittens for no apparent reason.
name: Goobbue Sproutling

verminion.skill_description: Disarms deployed enemy traps.

enhanced_description: To achieve their cyclopean size, goobbues must maintain a daily diet of several times their own weight. Luckily, the beastkin are not finicky eaters, and will consume almost anything that cannot outrun them. If rumors are to be believed, this includes Lalafells.

tooltip: A nice big aldgoat steak should put some color back in 'er cheeks.   - Lyngsath
description: Summon your wind-up aldgoat minion. No aldgoats were harmed in the making of this automaton.
name: Wind-up Aldgoat

verminion.skill_description: Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

enhanced_description: While in Ishgardian folklore the aldgoat is used to represent greed and gluttony, the Dunesfolk believe the insatiable creatures are a symbol of wealth and prosperity, and will present aldgoat fetishes to families with newborn children.

tooltip: The lads go through gear faster'n a coblyn chewin' on a chunk of mythril.   - Wawarukka
description: Summon your coblyn larva minion. Too dangerous to allow to grow any larger...too adorable to condemn to the furnace.
name: Coblyn Larva

verminion.skill_description:
Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a **monster**).
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Coblyns will lay their eggs near ore deposits so that when the larvae emerge, they will have a ready supply of nourishment to form their protective outer carapaces. This is a slow process which involves dousing the ore in digestive fluid, waiting for it to clarify, then ingesting the ooze.

tooltip: While little is known about them, what is known tends to be disturbing.   - Eorzean Naturalist
description: Summon your kidragora minion. Even in space, everyone can hear this seedkin scream.
name: Kidragora

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: One must take care when harvesting mandragoras, for if the roots are disturbed they will emit a high-pitched scream powerful enough to shatter glass over a malm away.

sources.text: Auriana - Mor Dhona - 3 Allagan Tomestones of Poetics

tooltip: Lightning Drools over the Bismarck's Delightful Grilled Dodo!   - The *Harbor Herald*
description: Summon your fledgling dodo minion. Properly trained not to eructate, regurgitate, expectorate, or flatulate.
name: Fledgling Dodo

verminion.skill_description: Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

enhanced_description: Dodos mature extremely fast, going from fledgling to full-grown fryer in but a few short moons. This, coupled with the fact an adult female can lay up to seven eggs a sennight, makes this particular cloudkin the perfect option for feeding the hungry masses.

tooltip: Black scorpion to sharpen one's wit; ahriman membrane for the mind.   - Severian
description: Summon your beady eye minion. That feeling you get sometimes that you are being watched? More often than not it is him.
name: Beady Eye

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: One of the most outlandish theories recently posed by scholars of the void is that ahrimans do not reproduce by typical sexual means, but rather by shedding tears which eventually grow into new creatures.

tooltip: Got naught but a sea lion's share of crab offal 'twixt them ears, I reckon.   - Ighii Moui
description: Summon your smallshell minion. The mere sight of this wee wavekin may cause severe psychological trauma to those who spent years of their lives on faraway shores culling his relatives.
name: Smallshell

verminion.skill_description: Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: As is implied by its name, the smallshell's shell is small. What is not widely known is that unlike normal crabs whose shells grow thicker and, hence, larger as the crabs age, smallshell carapaces actually reduce in size due to erosion over the wavekin's lifespan, until nothing is left but legs.

tooltip: The interior of its arm holds a surprising amount of fresh, drinkable water.   - Common Knowledge
description: Summon your cactuar cutting minion. Take care not to suffer 1,000 points of damage...to your heart.
name: Cactuar Cutting

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party movement speed by 30%. 
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Hab, loneliest zombie in the realm, is certain that this cactuar cutting was taken from his trusty companion Sabotendrick. Or if not, then most positively Sabotendred. What he does not know, is that it is, in fact, from the oft forgotten Sabotendale.

tooltip: Ul'dah ain't more'n a sand-crusted pile o' puk dung bakin' in the desert.   - Baderon Tenfingers
description: Summon your pudgy puk minion. Don't ask what he has eaten to grow so plump.
name: Pudgy Puk

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **monsters** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Fattened from birth to be a succulent snack for the sadistic Steropes, this fledgling puk's excess baggage ensures that even if he attempts to flee, he will not be getting that far.

tooltip: These toads are huge, which means they have huge guts.   - Hamon
description: Summon your gigantpole minion. Yes, it can survive for hours on end without any water, and yes, it can fly. Your argument is invalid.
name: Gigantpole

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 50%.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Over countless generations, the gigantoads of Thanalan have adapted to the arid climes by taking on traits not seen in their cousins to the north, such as thick membranes to keep their skin hydrated out of water, and a set of extra fins which act as wings to propel them over land.

tooltip: Pray retrieve the gift ere it is crushed beneath the iron feet of the dullahans!   - G'raha Tia
description: Summon your wind-up dullahan minion. Warning: may contain sharp parts.
name: Wind-up Dullahan

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 180 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: Some dullahans are believed to be shapeless entities who must first inhabit an inanimate host (such as a suit of armor) before gaining the ability to exert force upon the corporeal plane. Luckily, the only things inhabiting this wind-up contraption are manifold gears and rods.

sources.text: Auriana - Mor Dhona - 3 Allagan Tomestones of Poetics

tooltip: Between the four of us, surely we can outsmart a few rogue spriggans.   - Augustiniel
description: Summon your dust bunny minion. Despite the striking similarities, spriggans are not related to rabbits. But they have been known to eat them.
name: Dust Bunny

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: It is not fully known why spriggans hoard precious rocks and minerals, though scholars would have us believe that it is the rocks and minerals which are hoarding the spriggans, hence the creatures' scientific classification as soulkin.

sources.text: Junkmonger Nonoroon - Poor Maid's Mill - 2,400 Gil

tooltip: Even ate a wing off one afore I made up my mind to climb down the wall.   - Ahldfoet
description: Summon your baby bat minion. Has yet to acquire a taste for blood.
name: Baby Bat

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: Nonoroon, resident junkmonger at Memeroon's Trading Post, came up with the idea for capturing and selling baby bats one day while raiding caves for bat eggs...of which he could not find any.

tooltip: By the gods... This raptor is sublime!   - Nonopesa
description: Summon your baby raptor minion. Luckily for you, his teeth haven't all grown in...yet.
name: Baby Raptor

verminion.skill_description:
Renders the action party immune to all attacks by **poppets**.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Taking a hint from goblin merchants who raise raptors to serve as beasts of burden, a shopkeep from the village of Boughbury has begun hatching raptor eggs of his own (stolen from nearby nests). One can only hope the mother raptors are not as clever as the shopkeep thinks *he* is.

tooltip: What is that foul stench!? It's like the inside of an adamantoise's arse!   -  Wood Wailer Sentry
description: Summon your tiny tortoise minion. Will not carry you to an underwater kingdom if you ride on its back.
name: Tiny Tortoise

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 25%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: Hatched from an egg laid in the ivory sands of La Noscea's Salt Strand, if lucky, this baby adamantoise may live to see as many as ten score summers...that is, if it does not accidentally launch itself off a cliff with its constant spinning.

tooltip: Gummice pollums? I fear I'm not familiar with them.   - Yhom Epocan
description: Summon your gravel golem minion. Only you stand between it and a hard place.
name: Gravel Golem

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party DEF by 40.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Mage-controlled golems were in such wide use by the end of the Fifth Astral Era that entire battles were waged by armies comprised of nothing but the lifeless soulkin. This recreation, however, is nothing but a standard model #001 mammet outfitted with simple gravel plating.

tooltip: This bastard's got some nasty spells!   - Stalwart Swordsman
description: Summon your infant imp minion. Hopes that one day, he will rule the seven hells. But for now, your backside will do.
name: Infant Imp

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Scholars believe there are three ways in which voidsent can make the journey from their realm to ours─tearing a hole in the aether on their side, having a hole torn for them on our side, or stumbling into a randomly occurring hole, the latter being the most common for imps.

sources.text: Auriana - Mor Dhona - 3 Allagan Tomestones of Poetics

tooltip: When making an offering of antelope innards, it is proper they are still warm.   - Common Knowledge
description: Summon your wide-eyed fawn minion. His mother was either lost in a terrible hunting accident...or perhaps is just lost.
name: Wide-eyed Fawn

verminion.skill_description:
Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by **monsters**.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: An easy target for Eorzea's carnivorous fauna, antelopes must use every advantage they have to remain free from death's dripping jaws. One of those is the remarkable ability to run mere minutes from birth. Unfortunately, that trait did not save this specimen from capture.

tooltip: What am I going to do with a pile of dead vilekin?   - Waltheof
description: Summon your chigoe larva minion. This tiny vilekin takes the blood pact with his master *very* seriously.
name: Chigoe Larva

verminion.skill_description:
Increases action party ATK by 60.
**Duration:** 10s

enhanced_description: Chirurgeons of the fallen city of Gelmorra once used chigoes to leech the dark humours of the infirm until it was realized the patients were contracting additional maladies as a result of the treatment.

tooltip: You mushroom-headed, spindly-legged, spore- spewing abominations!   - Gabineaux
description: Summon your baby bun minion. Tastes great on salads and in stews.
name: Baby Bun

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 13%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: For those wondering on the ill effects of inhaling spores released by common funguars, according to the *Encyclopedia Eorzea* (third edition), funguar spores “befoul the body's humours and claim control of an individual's very soul, rendering them a mindless thrall.”

tooltip: Pray waste no time chasing rats.   - Nanamo Ul Namo
description: Summon your tiny rat minion. He may infest your granaries, and he may carry the plague, but he's *simply too adorable* to condemn to the life-ending jaws of a metal trap.
name: Tiny Rat

verminion.skill_description:
Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 25%.
**Duration:** 6s

enhanced_description: It was only recently that an enterprising merchant from the Sapphire Avenue Exchange in Ul'dah was tossed into the sultanate's oubliettes for fluffing the tails of rats caught on Pearl Lane and selling prettied pests to tourists as “tiny squirrels.”

tooltip: Did a morbol just empty its innards? I feel ill...   - Imperial Soldier
description: Summon your morbol seedling minion...if you think you can stand his breath.
name: Morbol Seedling

verminion.skill_description:
Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 20s

enhanced_description: It is in fashion amongst wealthy Ul'dahn merchants and nobles to bring morbol seedlings to banquets, so that the upper crust might inhale the seedkin's “boot-like” bad breath to induce vomiting, allowing them to engorge themselves for the duration of the gatherings.

tooltip: Disaster follows the man like a behemoth chasing a butterfly.   - Chechezan
description: Summon your baby behemoth minion. We can only hope his mother doesn't come looking for him.
name: Baby Behemoth

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230 to all enemies within range.

enhanced_description: Obtainable in Ul'dah's Sapphire Avenue Exchange for a fistful of coin and a smile, the pedigree of this baby beast is questionable at best. While displaying many behemoth-like features─a sleek violet hide, hungry eyes, and two polished horns─its squealing is not unlike a boar at slaughter.

sources.text: Minion Trader - The Gold Saucer - 2,400 Gil

tooltip: Brilliant bombs─ breathtaking, beautiful, brilliant!   - Acolyte Ba Go
description: Summon your cherry bomb minion─a miniature recreation of a voidsent bomb, created via the thaumaturgical rendering of umbrally charged aetherial energy. Guaranteed never to self-destruct, or your gil back.
name: Cherry Bomb

verminion.skill_description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all enemies within range. The action party is immediately withdrawn from the playing field after execution.

enhanced_description: To maintain the white-hot temperatures within their cores, bombs will feed upon almost any combustible material, including wood, charcoal, ceruleum, fire crystals, and even dragon peppers.

tooltip: There is no finer feel than that of a chocobo between your legs.   - L'dhakya
description: Summon your black chocobo chick minion. Rumors about her being able to fly are completely unfounded...or *are* they?
name: Black Chocobo Chick

verminion.skill_description:
Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range.
**Activation Delay:** 10s

enhanced_description: This poor chocobo chick was as yellow as an ear of millioncorn before one day being doused in black ink by a random passerby bedecked in silver accessories. Try as the chocobokeeps might, none were able to remove the taint, and thus the realm's first black chocobo was born.

tooltip: Chocobo dander can be a mite ripe.   - Chocobokeep
description: Summon your flame hatchling minion. Not more than a fortnight out of the shell, but his blood already runs Immortal Flames black.
name: Flame Hatchling

verminion.skill_description: Reduces action points of all enemies within range by 50% of the maximum value.

enhanced_description: Raised by a flame private from an egg found abandoned in the company stables he was charged with cleaning, this adorable fledgling is a symbol of new beginnings for the Immortal Flames.

tooltip: Chocobo dander can be a mite ripe.   - Chocobokeep
description: Summon your serpent hatchling minion. Not more than a fortnight out of the shell, but his blood already runs Twin Adder yellow.
name: Serpent Hatchling

verminion.skill_description: Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

enhanced_description: Raised by a serpent private from an egg found abandoned in the company stables he was charged with cleaning, this adorable fledgling is a symbol of new beginnings for the Order of the Twin Adder.

sources.text: Storm Quartermaster - Limsa Lominsa - 20,000 Storm Seals

tooltip: Chocobo dander can be a mite ripe.   - Chocobokeep
description: Summon your storm hatchling minion. Not more than a fortnight out of the shell, but his blood already runs Maelstrom red. Till sea swallows all!
name: Storm Hatchling

verminion.skill_description:
Binds all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 5s

enhanced_description: Raised by a storm private from an egg found abandoned in the company stables he was charged with cleaning, this adorable fledgling is a symbol of new beginnings for the mighty Maelstrom.

sources.text: Minion Trader - The Gold Saucer - 2,400 Gil

tooltip: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hooold your chocobos.   - Buscarron
description: Summon your wayward hatchling minion. Until he finds his real mother, you'll have to suffice.
name: Wayward Hatchling

verminion.skill_description:
Inflicts a weakness to **critters** on all enemies within range.
**Duration:** 15s

enhanced_description: Even if this orphaned avian were to stumble across his birth parent, chances are he would not even blink an eye, for it is well documented that immediately after hatching, chocobos recognize the first thing they see as their mother─that being you.
